Title: Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Sonic Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Selfless State + Tap Follow-Up Orb</color>
Flowing Whirlpool: <color=#0d70bc>Selfless State + After the 3rd/4th hit of Basic Attack + Tap Follow-Up Orb repeatedly</color>

BriefDes: Once activated, enters the <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>. In this state, removes all Signal Orbs (no more orbs will be generated) except the Follow-Up Orb and restores Signature Energy for each orb removed. The Follow-Up Orb will not be grayed out. DEF and Ice DMG increase. Triggering Matrix and successful dodge during <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> recover Dodge Gauge. Ice DMG increases when in Matrix.

In <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>, tap the Follow-Up Orb to consume Signature Energy and cast <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color>, dealing Ice DMG. <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color> and Basic Attack after dodge will start from the 4th hit.

After the 3rd or 4th hit of Basic Attack, tap the Follow-Up Orb repeatedly to perform <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color>, a storm of quick attacks that strike the area in front. The attacks consume Signature Energy and deal Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color>.

Tapping the Signature button again in <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> will consume Signature Energy to return random Signal Orbs, gray out the Follow-Up Orb, and leave <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>.
SpecificDes:
Once activated, enters the <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>. In this state, removes all Signal Orbs (no more orbs will be generated) except the Follow-Up Orb and restores Signature Energy for each orb removed. The Follow-Up Orb will not be grayed out. DEF and Ice DMG increase. Triggering Matrix and successful dodge during <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> recover Dodge Gauge. Ice DMG increases when in Matrix.

- Triggering Matrix and successful dodge during <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> recover <color=#D91414>100</color> Dodge Gauge.

While A2 is on standby, <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> will deactivate if <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is fully depleted.

Title: Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>100 Energy + Tap Signature</color>

Incinerating Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Incinerating Orb</color>

Once all <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> are used up, Roland leaves <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> and the <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color> also disappears.

Fires multiple incinerating bullets forward, dealing Fire DMG with 1 <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color>. Gains Super Armor while casting this move.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Hangs on the Chain Blade and swings across the battlefield, launching 4 incendiary bombs toward the ground that deal Fire DMG.
SpecificDes: Hangs on the Chain Blade and swings across the battlefield, launching 4 incendiary bombs toward the ground that deal Fire DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.

Title: Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Trigger valid combos</color>
BriefDes: The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio is adjusted. Gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> based on the combo type upon triggering <color=#D91414>valid combos</color>. Roland's Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate Energy. The combos of Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills can be viewed in the description of each skill. <color=#D91414>Valid combos</color>: The Basic Attack combo launched within 1s after dealing DMG from Basic Attacks. Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast does not consume any <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Roland cannot gain Signal Orbs from Basic Attacks. When he is switched off battle, he gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or Energy, prioritizing <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.
SpecificDes:
The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio is adjusted. Gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> based on the combo type upon triggering <color=#D91414>valid combos</color>. Roland's Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate Energy. The combos of Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills can be viewed in the description of each skill. <color=#D91414>Valid combos</color>: The Basic Attack combo launched within 1s after dealing DMG from Basic Attacks. Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast does not consume any <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Roland cannot gain Signal Orbs from Basic Attacks. When he is switched off battle, he gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or Energy, prioritizing <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.
- The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio changes to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>.
- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> (up to <color=#D91414>90</color>) based on the combo type.
- Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are at least <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.
- Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate <color=#D91414>10</color> Energy.

- Gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> when switched off battle.
- Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>5</color> Energy.

SpecificDes: Performs beam attacks with her Scepter and drones, dealing Physical DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.

Title: Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Empyrea State: <color=#0d70bc>Empyreal Prayer + Ping any orb</color>
BriefDes: When there is at least 80 energy, Liv: Empyrea can cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color> to consume all energy and enter <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> with her M.I.N.D. plunged into a corrupted data space, gaining full <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> and <color=#D91414>6</color> random Signal Orbs (with a guaranteed set of 3-Ping orbs) while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>.

While in <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color>, double tapping the Dodge button will trigger <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color>, during which <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> can be amplified by pinging <color=#D91414>3 sets</color> of orbs of any color. When <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> ends, Liv performs <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color>, dealing Fire DMG to targets in an extremely large area while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> is not triggered, <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color> will be performed without any amplification when <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> ends.
SpecificDes: When there is at least 80 energy, Liv: Empyrea can cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color> to consume all energy and enter <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> with her M.I.N.D. plunged into a corrupted data space, gaining full <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> and <color=#D91414>6</color> random Signal Orbs (with a guaranteed set of 3-Ping orbs) while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>.

While in <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color>, double tapping the Dodge button will trigger <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color>, during which <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> can be amplified by pinging <color=#D91414>3 sets</color> of orbs of any color. When <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> ends, Liv performs <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color>, dealing Fire DMG to targets in an extremely large area while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> is not triggered, <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color> will be performed without any amplification when <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> ends.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\n- <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color>-Ping grants <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> <color=#D91414>1/2/4</color> stack(s) of amplification and each stack increases the base multiplier by <color=#D91414>0.5</color>.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Dives into battle and releases an energy blast in the air, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.
SpecificDes: Dives into battle and releases an energy blast in the air, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.

Title: Divine Prayer: <color=#0d70bc>Double tap Dodge</color>
Purity Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Same-colored 3-Pings</color>
Chaos Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Different-colored 3-Pings</color>
BriefDes: Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full, <color=#D91414>double tapping</color> the Dodge button triggers <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> that grants DMG Reduction. While in Divine Prayer, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.
If both sets of Signal Orbs are of the same color, triggers <color=#D91414>Purity Oath</color> that deals AOE Fire DMG.

If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers <color=#D91414>Chaos Oath</color> that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and <color=#D91414>a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea</color>.

- When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore <color=#D91414>100</color> Dodge Energy.

Title: Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb + Hold the joystick</color>

BriefDes: Signature Move: Consumes 80 Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, gaining Extra DMG Reduction. Selena: Capriccio gains 5 <color=#D91414>Shooting Stars</color>. At the end of <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, all Signal Orbs will be rearranged in the order of Red-Blue-Yellow.
Each time a <color=#D91414>Shooting Star</color> is cast, Selena: Capriccio will dash toward the target, dealing Dark DMG.

When all <color=#D91414>Shooting Stars</color> are consumed, Selena: Capriccio will control all phantoms to launch a follow-up attack to cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Twin Stars</color> again, then she will play her Flute Sword to trigger <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and order all phantoms to attack the enemy with the phantom dealing Dark DMG. Meanwhile, Realm of Capriccio will be detonated, dealing Dark DMG while leaving a phantom behind, healing ally units within the range every second.

After casting, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> will be reset and Nanami will exit the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Fire DMG.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Nanami: Starfarer comes down from above and smashes the ground, dealing AOE Fire DMG.
SpecificDes: Nanami: Starfarer comes down from above and smashes the ground, dealing AOE Fire DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Fire DMG.

Title: Slide Mode: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge/Cast Quantum Compression Shot/Flame Bombing</color>
Bzzz Mode: <color=#0d70bc>"Rumbling" Mode + Cast Ironsoul Slice + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
Oops! Missed it!: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Mode + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging halfway</color>
Perfect!: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Mode + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging more than halfway</color>
Burning Blow: <color=#0d70bc>At least 200 Pressure + "Bzzz" Mode + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging to the limit</color>
Mirage Flash: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Mode + Release Basic Attack + Successful Dodge</color>
BriefDes: Press and hold Dodge or cast <color=#D91414>Quantum Compression Shot</color>/<color=#D91414>Flame Bombing</color> to trigger Nanami: Starfarer's Slide Mode, during which the above skills can be cast without intervals.

When in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, Nanami: Starfarer will gain a Pressure Gauge. When <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> hits an enemy, press and hold Basic Attack to trigger the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, during which releasing the Basic Attack button at different timings will trigger <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> or <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>.

<color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> will grant Pressure and Signature Energy, during which time Nanami will gain Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. The <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> variants triggered from <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> all deal Fire DMG.

<color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> will grant Pressure and Signature Energy, during which time Nanami will gain Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. The <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> variants triggered from <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> all deal Fire DMG.

When there is enough Pressure, press and hold Basic Attack to the limit to consume all Pressure and cast <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> to restore Signature Energy and grant the damage multiplier of <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> plus a DMG Bonus based on the Pressure consumed to the corresponding <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color>. The Base DMG of this skill is increased based on the amount of Pressure consumed. Once the total damage is calculated, it will be recorded. When Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, she will become temporarily invincible and deal a portion of the recorded damage again, after which the record will be reset.

Nanami: Starfarer is able to dodge incoming attacks during a brief period when she starts to cast <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> and <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>. Upon a successful dodge, she will cast <color=#D91414>Mirage Flash</color>, dealing Fire DMG and generating Pressure.

Tap the Signature button again to cast <color=#D91414>Frost-Treated Blade: Quench</color>, dealing DMG and giving all enemies <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> for a period of time based on the <color=#D91414>Froststream Level</color>. Remove <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> from enemies when damaging affected enemies with <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color>.

Title: Bitter Frost: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge</color>
BriefDes: Press and hold Dodge to activate and charge <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color>. Release Dodge when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is fully charged to release <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color>, dealing Ice DMG. Releasing Dodge before fully charged will result in no attacks, and <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> will gradually decrease. Getting hit while charging will deduct Dodge Gauge and performs Flash if there is enough Dodge Gauge available. Gains Super Armor and bonus Extra DMG Reduction when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is activated.

BriefDes: Karenina: Scire jumps up into the air for the Blast Hammer to transform into a cannon to fire a gravity shot against the ground to temporarily pull enemies around her and slow them down, dealing Dark DMG and inflicting <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> on them to reduce their Dark Resistance. Meanwhile, Karenina gains an Anti-gravity Shield. If any Blue or Yellow Orb is pinged while Karenina is launching an attack, she will stay in the attack status and attack again, dealing DMG based on the number of the orbs pinged.
When pinging any Blue or Yellow Orb while launching this attack, Karenina: Scire will stay in the attack status and shoot again, dealing damage based on the number of the orbs pinged.
SpecificDes:
Karenina: Scire jumps up into the air for the Blast Hammer to transform into a cannon to fire a gravity shot against the ground to temporarily pull enemies around her and slow them down, dealing Dark DMG and inflicting <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> on them to reduce their Dark Resistance. Meanwhile, Karenina gains an Anti-gravity Shield. If any Blue or Yellow Orb is pinged while Karenina is launching an attack, she will stay in the attack status and attack again, dealing DMG based on the number of the orbs pinged.

When pinging any Blue or Yellow Orb while launching this attack, Karenina: Scire will stay in the attack status and shoot again, dealing damage based on the number of the orbs pinged.

Title: Leap Attack: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping available + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
Anti-gravity Status: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Leap Attack</color>
Radiant Whirlwind: <color=#0d70bc>Character is airborne + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>
Gravity Overload: <color=#0d70bc>Triggered when character lands</color>
Kinetic Energy: <color=#0d70bc>Automatically accumulated when casting Radiant Whirlwind/Basic Attack speed-up</color>
Airborne Spin: <color=#0d70bc>Anti-gravity status + Tap Dodge</color>
BriefDes: When Karenina: Scire has at least a set of 3-Ping Orbs among up to 8 Signal Orbs, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and consume 3-Ping Orbs (up to 2 sets can be consumed), each set granting Anti-gravity Energy. While charging, Karenina cannot dodge but gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. After that, Karenina leaps up into the air with <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> that deals Dark DMG (its Base DMG increases if 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs have been consumed) and activates the Anti-gravity status. When Karenina enters Matrix, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and automatically consume Matrix's orb pinging effect (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs).
Gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction while in the Anti-gravity status.

While in the Anti-gravity status, tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will cast <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> that deals Dark DMG (each Basic Attack increases Karenina: Scire's airborne duration and spin speed).

Upon landing, <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color> will be triggered to grant Signature Energy and deal Dark DMG. If Karenina: Scire has sufficient Anti-gravity Energy, she will automatically leap up into the air again by consuming certain Anti-gravity Energy. Once Anti-gravity Energy is insufficient, she will exit the Anti-gravity status with empty Anti-gravity Energy.

Each <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> cast and Basic Attack speed-up will grant Kinetic Energy. Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all the Kinetic Energy with each point consumed granting bonus Base DMG.

When the Anti-gravity status is activated, tapping Dodge casts <color=#D91414>Airborne Spin</color> by consuming double Dodge Gauge to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG while restoring Anti-gravity Energy and Signature Energy. Upon a successful dodge, <color=#D91414>Returning Repulsion</color> will be cast to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG and restoring additional Dodge Gauge.
SpecificDes:
When Karenina: Scire has at least a set of 3-Ping Orbs among up to 8 Signal Orbs, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and consume 3-Ping Orbs (up to 2 sets can be consumed), each set granting Anti-gravity Energy. While charging, Karenina cannot dodge but gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. After that, Karenina leaps up into the air with <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> that deals Dark DMG (its Base DMG increases if 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs have been consumed) and activates the Anti-gravity status. When Karenina enters Matrix, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and automatically consume Matrix's orb pinging effect (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs).
- Every set of 3-Ping Orbs consumed grants <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy.
- While charging, gains <color=#D91414>50/80/90%</color> Extra DMG Reduction based on the number of 3-Pings made.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG when leaping into the air.
- When two sets of 3-Ping Orbs are consumed during the charging, the <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> will deal <color=#D91414>200%</color> more Base DMG.
Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> Extra DMG Reduction while in the Anti-gravity status.

While in the Anti-gravity status, tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will cast <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> that deals Dark DMG (each Basic Attack increases Karenina: Scire's airborne duration and spin speed).\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.

Upon landing, <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color> will be triggered to grant Signature Energy and deal Dark DMG. If Karenina: Scire has sufficient Anti-gravity Energy, she will automatically leap up into the air again by consuming certain Anti-gravity Energy. Once Anti-gravity Energy is insufficient, she will exit the Anti-gravity status with empty Anti-gravity Energy.
- Triggering <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color> grants <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.
- When there is no less than <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy, Karenina: Scire will automatically leap up into the air again by consuming <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy.

Each <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> cast and Basic Attack speed-up will grant Kinetic Energy. Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all the Kinetic Energy with each point consumed granting bonus Base DMG.
- Every <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> cast grants <color=#D91414>7</color> Kinetic Energy.
- Every Basic Attack speed-up grants <color=#D91414>21</color> Kinetic Energy.
- The limit of Kinetic Energy is <color=#D91414>999</color>.
- Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all the Kinetic Energy with each point consumed granting <color=#D91414>0.12%</color> more Base DMG, up to <color=#D91414>100%</color>.

When the Anti-gravity status is activated, tapping Dodge casts <color=#D91414>Airborne Spin</color> by consuming double Dodge Gauge to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG while restoring Anti-gravity Energy and Signature Energy. Upon a successful dodge, <color=#D91414>Returning Repulsion</color> will be cast to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG and restoring additional Dodge Gauge.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.
- Restores <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy and <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy (can be triggered once per 10s only).
- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.
- Restores additional <color=#D91414>500</color> Dodge Gauge value (can be triggered once per 10s only).

Title: Charge Engine: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>
Gear-Break Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack repeatedly to trigger a Combo Strike</color>
Assault-Rising Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Gear Lv.3 + Trigger Combo Strike</color>
BriefDes: After casting a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to charge up the Rising Engine. When the tapping stops or goes over a certain period of time, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> based on the color of Signal Orbs pinged, and its DMG will depend on the current <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color>. Triggering a Combo Strike also consumes all <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> charged to increase its DMG dealt. The <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> consumed will be converted into <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>.

The next time <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered, if the current <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> exceeds <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>, <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will go up by 1.

If <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered at Gear Lv.3, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Assault-Rising Combo</color> instead with an increased Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color> and <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will be reset afterward.
SpecificDes: After casting a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to charge up the Rising Engine. Triggering a Combo Strike also consumes all <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> charged to increase its DMG dealt. The <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> consumed will be converted into <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Lightning DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color>.\n- The Rising Energy charged will increase a Combo Strike's DMG. Each tap increases Base DMG by <color=#D91414>15%</color>.

The next time <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered, if the current <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> exceeds <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>, <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will go up by 1.

If <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered at Gear Lv.3, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Assault-Rising Combo</color> instead with an increased Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color> and <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will be reset afterward.\n- The Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Assault-Rising Combo</color> increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.

BriefDes: Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target with the Swordstaff.

After a successful dodge or the 4th hit of Basic Attack, Bianca: Stigmata will activate <color=#D91414>Resolution</color>. When <color=#D91414>Resolution</color> is active, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash a thrusting attack, then continue to press and hold Basic Attack to launch a 3-hit <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> that deals Physical DMG to the target. During <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color>, Bianca: Stigmata is invincible, her position can be adjusted by moving the joystick.

When Bianca: Stigmata is under the effect of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>, every hit of her Basic Attack and <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> generates extra <color=#D91414>Afterglow Shadow</color> that deals Physical DMG to the target.

Title: Bright Candle: <color=#0d70bc>Staff Form + 60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>

BriefDes: Casts <color=#D91414>Bright Candle</color> to damage enemies within a certain range, triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and activating the weapon's <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>. Orbs cannot be pinged in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>. When <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> is activated, the Afterglow Points from Bianca's Core Passive are converted into <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>. Basic Attacks, Sword Dance and Afterglow Shadow in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> will accumulate <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> upon dealing DMG. Gains Super Armor during <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>.

While in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>, consumes Energy and all stacks of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> to unleash <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color>.

Title: Afterglow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Upon entering battle or when entering Staff Form</color>
Simulated Matrix: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Luminous Realm</color>

BriefDes: When Bianca: Stigmata enters battle or enters <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, a set of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> will be generated above the Signal Orb bar.

Bianca: Stigmata is unable to trigger Matrix via Dodge. When her weapon is in <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, press and hold Dodge to perform <color=#D91414>Simulated Matrix</color> and activate <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color>.

Pinging a set of Signal Orbs in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> can also consume the <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> that are of the same color and aligned directly above them. Upon successful pinging of Afterglow Orbs, Bianca: Stigmata will launch <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> to deal Physical DMG to targets within range. Pinging Signal Orbs and <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> will both generate <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color>.
SpecificDes: When Bianca: Stigmata enters battle or enters <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, a set of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> will be generated above the Signal Orb bar.

When her weapon is in <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, press and hold Dodge to perform <color=#D91414>Simulated Matrix</color> and activate <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> lasts <color=#D91414>4s</color> and has a <color=#D91414>12s</color> cooldown.\n- Upon activation of Simulated Matrix, <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is also triggered and it ends when Luminous Realm is activated.

Pinging a set of Signal Orbs in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> can also consume the <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> that are of the same color and aligned directly above them. Upon successful pinging of Afterglow Orbs, Bianca: Stigmata will launch <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> to deal Physical DMG to targets within range. Pinging Signal Orbs and <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> will both generate <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the total number of Signal Orbs and Afterglow Orbs pinged.\n- Generates <color=#D91414>1/2/3/6/7/8</color> <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color> based on the total number of Signal Orbs and Afterglow Orbs pinged.

Title: Strings On Me: <color=#0d70bc>Jete Points + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
Solitary Dancer: <color=#0d70bc>Strings On Me + Take Hit/Release Basic Attack</color>
Pas De Chat: <color=#0d70bc>Solitary Dancer + Ping</color>
Pas De Chat: <color=#0d70bc>Successful Dodge + Solitary Dancer + Ping</color>
Pact of Memory: <color=#0d70bc>Solitary Dancer + 3-Ping</color>
BriefDes: When <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> are greater than <color=#D91414>0</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color>, performing Basic Attacks continuously.

When Bambinata: Vitrum is attacked while <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated, she will consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> to automatically dodge the attack and leap into the air, entering the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. When <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated at full <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, release the Basic Attack button to consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> and leap up to enter the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. During the leap, Bambinata: Vitrum dodges incoming attacks.

Consuming Signal Orbs in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will trigger <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, dealing Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.

If Bambinata: Vitrum has entered the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form by successfully dodging an attack, pinging Signal Orbs will trigger the more powerful <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> that deals Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.

Triggering <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> with a 3-Ping in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will grant 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> (up to <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks), causing Bambinata: Vitrum to forget the color of this 3-Ping and no longer gain orbs of this color. All orbs of this color will be converted to other orbs that have not been forgotten yet. At <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, all the remaining orbs will be forgotten and Bambinata can no longer gain Signal Orbs. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> will remove all stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> and refund the forgotten orbs. For each <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> increases.
SpecificDes:
When <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> are greater than <color=#D91414>0</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color>, performing Basic Attacks continuously.
- <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> increase by <color=#D91414>40/80/160</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.
- The maximum limit of <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> is <color=#D91414>160</color>.
- While <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated, <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> are consumed every <color=#D91414>0.1s</color>.

When Bambinata: Vitrum is attacked while <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated, she will consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> to automatically dodge the attack and leap into the air, entering the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. When <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated at full <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, release the Basic Attack button to consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> and leap up to enter the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. During the leap, Bambinata: Vitrum dodges incoming attacks.

Consuming Signal Orbs in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will trigger <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, dealing Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

If Bambinata: Vitrum has entered the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form by successfully dodging an attack, pinging Signal Orbs will trigger the more powerful <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> that deals Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

Triggering <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> with a 3-Ping in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will grant 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> (up to <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks), causing Bambinata: Vitrum to forget the color of this 3-Ping and no longer gain orbs of this color. All orbs of this color will be converted to other orbs that have not been forgotten yet.\n- At <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, all the remaining orbs will be forgotten and Bambinata can no longer gain Signal Orbs. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> will remove all stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> and refund the forgotten orbs.\n- For each <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>60%</color>.

Color Mix: Clash of Concepts: <color=#0d70bc>Main Color is different from Secondary Color + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>

Vibrant Brushstroke: <color=#0d70bc>Painter's Realm + Any Orb Ping</color>
Hued Splash: <color=#0d70bc>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis/Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>
Art Influence: <color=#0d70bc>Receive Healing</color>
BriefDes: The <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> is filled with a Signal Orb color by default. Upon a 3-Ping, Coolant in the 3-Ping color will fill the <color=#D91414>Secondary Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>1</color> type of Coolant). Subsequent Coolant will replace the previous Coolant.
Performs 2 consecutive sweep attacks, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.
Dashes forward before turning around for a sweep attack, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.

Rides the Beam Gunlance and draws a colorful trail, causing an explosion upon hitting the enemy for the first time and dealing Ice DMG to enemies within the area. Gains DMG Reduction and Super Armor in the skill duration.

Ayla: Kaleido restores <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy to herself and heals her allies within the area every time she casts <color=#D91414>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis</color> or <color=#D91414>Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>, storing <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> of the <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>3</color>). Dashes forward before turning around for a sweep attack, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.

Rides the Beam Gunlance and draws a colorful trail, causing an explosion upon hitting the enemy for the first time and dealing Ice DMG to enemies within the area. Gains <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction and Super Armor in the skill duration.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

Title: Slash: Dispel Shadow: <color=#0d70bc>Kodachi in Hand + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Slash: Annihilate: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Blading Radiance: <color=#0d70bc>After the 4th Basic Attack/Dodge + Blade Lights Up + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Unquenchable Flare: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Activate Selfless Stance + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Shatter All Scourges: <color=#0d70bc>Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the kodachi and techniques.
Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the odachi.

When the blade lights up after the 4th Basic Attack/Dodge, tap Basic Attack to trigger <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, then tap Basic Attack continuously to unleash swordwaves, dealing Lightning DMG.

When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color> with <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to launch <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> and jump up to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> in midair, pulling enemies in the area and dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color>, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno</color>.
Alpha's next Basic Attack after a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping will launch a follow-up attack and deal Lightning DMG.
SpecificDes: Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the kodachi and techniques.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.
Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the odachi.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.

When the blade lights up after the 4th Basic Attack/Dodge, tap Basic Attack to trigger <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, then tap Basic Attack continuously to unleash swordwaves for up to <color=#D91414>2.5s</color>, dealing Lightning DMG.\n- <color=#D91414>When Alpha holds the kodachi</color>, each swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\n- <color=#D91414>When Alpha holds the odachi</color>, each swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.

When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color> with <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to launch <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> and jump up to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> in midair, pulling enemies in the area and dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color>, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\n- <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.

Alpha's next Basic Attack after a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping will launch a follow-up attack and deal Lightning DMG.\n- The follow-up attack after the Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping will deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.

When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color>, tap Signature to consume Signature Energy and deal Lightning DMG to enemies in a large area. Alpha then puts the odachi away and <color=#D91414>holds the kodachi in hand</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting the skill.

Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting the skill.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.

Title: Formless Confrontation
Sundered Delusion: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge</color>
Resolute Blow: <color=#0d70bc>Foresight Charge + Release Dodge</color>
Aphotic Points: <color=#0d70bc>Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/Blading Radiance/Resolute Blow</color>
BriefDes: When <color=#D91414>wielding the kodachi</color>, Alpha can only use Blue Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of other orbs by default. When <color=#D91414>wielding the odachi</color>, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.

Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>.

Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>. Afterward, release Dodge to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge. Performing a powerful slash when <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> is full will make Alpha Invincible, clear <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color>, and restore Signature Energy.

Gains <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill, <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, or <color=#D91414>Resolute Blow</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> to increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare's</color> <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> based on the <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> consumed.
SpecificDes: When <color=#D91414>wielding the kodachi</color>, Alpha can only use Blue Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of other orbs by default. When <color=#D91414>wielding the odachi</color>, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.

Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>.
- Restores <color=#D91414>4 Blade Aura</color> every <color=#D91414>0.1</color>s in <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color> Mode.
- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/40 Blade Aura</color> based on the number of the orbs pinged.
- <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> Limit: <color=#D91414>120</color>.
- When taking DMG in the Parry Stance, increases DMG Reduction to <color=#D91414>70%</color>. Can parry up to 3 times.

Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>. Afterward, release Dodge at <color=#D91414>0/60/120</color> <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.
- When <color=#D91414>holding the kodachi</color>, Alpha deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG.
- When <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color>, Alpha deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Lightning DMG.
- Performing a powerful slash when <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> is full will make Alpha Invincible, clear <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color>, and restore <color=#D91414>25</color> Signature Energy.
- Alpha will automatically perform a powerful slash 1.5s after <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> reaches the upper limit.

Gains <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill, <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, or <color=#D91414>Resolute Blow</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> to increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare's</color> <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> based on the <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> consumed.

SpecificDes:
Leaps into the air and spins, dealing DMG to the surrounding enemies and restoring the HP of nearby allies. Activates the <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> effect that increases Physical DMG.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.
- Restores HP of allies in a large area equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Hanying's attack 
- <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration refreshes when stacks overlap.

Title: Spring of Emerald Flow: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>
Dance of Emerald Flow: <color=#0d70bc>At least 1 [Dancer Point] + Tap Dodge</color>
Ballad of Wilting Bamboos: <color=#0d70bc>[Dancer Stance] + Ping Red [Dance Orb]</color>
Coda of Scattering Butterflies: <color=#0d70bc>[Dancer Stance] + Ping Yellow [Dance Orb]</color>
Verse of Singing Breeze: <color=#0d70bc>[Dancer Stance] + Ping Blue [Dance Orb]</color>
BriefDes: Hanying gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color> after any 3-Ping, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> Points.

After spending 1 <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color>, Hanying will perform a <color=#D91414>Choreography</color>, entering <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, recovering <color=#D91414>16</color> Signature Energy, and gaining <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color>. In <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into <color=#D91414>Dance Orbs</color> (with color unchanged) that cast <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> when pinged, and Hanying can only perform 1-Pings. Hanying gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while casting Poise of Emerald Flow. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> or <color=#D91414>Vision of Mountains</color> by <color=#D91414>20%</color> (max <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks). Exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> will reset <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> to <color=#D91414>0</color>. Performing 4 consecutive <color=#D91414>Choreographies</color> will leave behind a healing zone that restores the HP of allies in the area and grants <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>, which increases Physical DMG.
<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Red: Swings the fan to deal DMG, exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.

<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Yellow: Steps on the airborne fan and dashes forward, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.
<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Blue: Dances at her location, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.
SpecificDes: Hanying gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color> after any 3-Ping, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> Points.

After spending 1 <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color>, Hanying will perform a <color=#D91414>Choreography</color>, entering <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, recovering <color=#D91414>16</color> Signature Energy, and gaining <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color>. In <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into <color=#D91414>Dance Orbs</color> (with color unchanged) that cast <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> when pinged, and Hanying can only perform 1-Pings. Hanying gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while casting Poise of Emerald Flow. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> or <color=#D91414>Vision of Mountains</color> by <color=#D91414>20%</color> (max <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks). Exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> will reset <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> to <color=#D91414>0</color>. Performing 4 consecutive <color=#D91414>Choreographies</color> will leave behind a healing zone that restores the HP of allies in the area and grants <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>, which increases Physical DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Choreography</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.
- The healing zone restores allies' HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Hanying's ATK for <color=#D91414>4</color>s.
- <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Recasting will refresh the duration.
<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Red: Swings the fan to deal DMG, exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.

<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Yellow: Steps on the airborne fan and dashes forward, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.

<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Blue: Dances at her location, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.

SpecificDes: Thrusts forward and deals Lightning DMG to the target.\n- Casting a 3-Ping Skill will trigger a move change and deal more damage.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.

Title: Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>

SpecificDes: Quickly swings her claws to perform a multi-hit attack against the target.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.

Title: Sky-ripping Arcflash: <color=#0d70bc>110 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Leaps into the air and uses the speed of her fall to smash the target on the ground, dealing Lightning DMG. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: No. 21: Feral launches a descending attack on the target, dealing Lightning DMG and restoring HP.
SpecificDes: No. 21: Feral launches a descending attack on the target, dealing Lightning DMG and restoring HP.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG and heals for HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.

Title: Fledgling Wings: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping</color>
Dusk Fluorescence: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Forest Predator: <color=#0d70bc>During a 3-Ping + Ping Signal Orb</color>
Wolfspirit Release: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Basic Attack/Press and Hold Basic Attack and Then Tap Basic Attack Repeatedly</color>
Critical Arclight
Sheltering Wolves: <color=#0d70bc>Receive Healing</color>
BriefDes: No. 21: Feral generates a Shield at the cost of her HP when casting a 3-Ping Skill. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.

After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the <color=#D91414>Predator Stance</color>. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> to deal Lightning DMG, gain <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, and restore HP to allies within range. When a <color=#D91414>purple mark</color> appears, immediately tapping Basic Attack will cast a more powerful <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> and gain more <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. During <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> and <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color>, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and DMG Reduction.

Every time entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color>, No. 21: Feral will activate <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color>, during which extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> and add additional Lightning DMG to <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>. When there is a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark</color> will last until the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> is gone. Casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> will deactivate the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>. When No. 21 casts <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.

With max <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack, <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> will be cast with <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. It will end with <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> once all <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are depleted. <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> and <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 can adjust her position by dodging with Super Armor and DMG Reduction granted in <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>.

<color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Release</color> attacks grant <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> and increase <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG.
Allies gain <color=#D91414>Lightning Surge</color> which increases their Lightning DMG after being healed.
SpecificDes: No. 21: Feral generates a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>50%</color> of Max HP for <color=#D91414>12</color>s at the cost of <color=#D91414>25%</color> of her current HP when casting a 3-Ping Skill. Triggering this again will refresh the duration and increase the Shield value up to <color=#D91414>100%</color> of No. 21's Max HP. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.

After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the <color=#D91414>Predator Stance</color>. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> to deal Lightning DMG, gain <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, and restore HP to allies within range. When a <color=#D91414>purple mark</color> appears, immediately tapping Basic Attack will cast a more powerful <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> and gain more <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. During <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> and <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color>, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.
- Red Orb 3-Ping: <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.
- Yellow Orb 3-Ping: <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.
- Blue Orb 3-Ping: <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Lightning DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.
- <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are capped at <color=#D91414>240</color>.
- Casting <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> grants <color=#D91414>80 Wolfspirit Points</color> while casting <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> grants <color=#D91414>160 Wolfspirit Points</color>.
- Casting <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> and <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> will restore HP equal to <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> of No. 21's ATK to her allies within range.

Every time entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color>, No. 21: Feral will activate <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color>, during which extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> and add additional Lightning DMG to <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>. When there is a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark</color> will last until the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> is gone. Casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> will deactivate the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>. When No. 21 casts <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.
- Up to <color=#D91414>3</color> extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting Forest Predator. The record will be reset when <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color> is cast again.
- <color=#D91414>Each</color> Signal Orb pinged will trigger a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> for <color=#D91414>0.5s</color>. The Deceleration Field can be stacked.
- <color=#D91414>Each</color> Signal Orb pinged will deal an additional <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG <color=#D91414>1</color> more time when casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>.

With max <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack, <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> will be cast with <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. It will end with <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> once all <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are depleted. <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> and <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 can adjust her position by dodging with Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction granted in <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>.\n- Each <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> consumes <color=#D91414>15 Wolfspirit Points</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 <color=#D91414>2</color> Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK to her allies within range.\n- <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of her ATK to her allies within range.

<color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Release</color> attacks grant <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> and increase <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG.\n- <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>100</color> points with each <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> point increasing <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.\n- In the <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>, each <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> grants <color=#D91414>5 Critical Arclight</color>, while each <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> grants <color=#D91414>20 Critical Arclight</color>.

Allies gain <color=#D91414>Lightning Surge</color> which increases their Lightning DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.

BriefDes: All members' ATK increases. All Amplifiers' Lightning DMG increases.
SpecificDes: All members' ATK increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. All Amplifiers' Lightning DMG increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.

Increases the effects of the Amplifier Class Skill. Extra Signal Orbs pinged in the <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color> Form will make No. 21 deal Lightning DMG more times through <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>.

Title: Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Revving Charge: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack to charge</color>
Revving Burst: <color=#0d70bc>Charge + Release Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Noctis strikes the target multiple times with martial arts, dealing Lightning DMG.
Press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#D91414>charge</color> and gain Energy. Getting attacked while charging will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color> automatically.

Releasing Basic Attack while <color=#D91414>charging</color> will hit the enemy in front with a powerful punch, dealing Lightning DMG based on the charge level. Noctis can dodge during the attack, and dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color>.
SpecificDes: Noctis strikes the target multiple times with martial arts, dealing Lightning DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.

Press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#D91414>charge</color> and gain Energy. Getting attacked while charging will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color> automatically.\n- Gains 30 Energy every second while <color=#D91414>charging</color>.

Releasing Basic Attack while <color=#D91414>charging</color> will hit the enemy in front with a powerful punch, dealing Lightning DMG based on the charge level. Noctis can dodge during the attack, and dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG with an incomplete charge.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG with a complete charge.

Title: Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>120 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Skull Crush: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + Engine Points + Tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Throws out an explosive grenade that deals Lightning DMG to the targets within range, then enters <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. Press and hold Basic Attack when Noctis performs any 3-Ping Skill in the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> to execute a follow-up attack, casting <color=#D91414>Lightning Smash</color>, <color=#D91414>Lightning Punch</color>, or <color=#D91414>Lightning Sweep</color> based on the color of the orbs and resetting <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form's</color> duration.

Gathers power and strikes, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies within a large area. Amplifies the damage based on <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color>. Exits the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> afterward.
SpecificDes: Throws out an explosive grenade that deals Lightning DMG to the targets within range, then enters <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. Press and hold Basic Attack when Noctis performs any 3-Ping Skill in the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> to execute a follow-up attack, casting <color=#D91414>Lightning Smash</color>, <color=#D91414>Lightning Punch</color>, or <color=#D91414>Lightning Sweep</color> based on the color of the orbs and resetting <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form's</color> duration.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\n- Unable to gain Energy in the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color>.

Gathers power and strikes, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies within a large area. Amplifies the damage based on <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color>. Exits the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> afterward.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> amplifies <color=#D91414>Base DMG of Skull Crush by 80%</color>. Engine Points can be stacked up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times.

Title: Impact Nullification: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Dodge</color>
Heat Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + A Single Orb</color>
Energy Overload: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + A Single Orb + Ping Overload Orb</color>
Thunderous Fury: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + Ping Blast Orb</color>
Thunderclap Strike: <color=#0d70bc>During Thunderous Fury + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Noctis enters a defense stance and can dodge attacks in this state. Dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color>. When performing a precise dodge, Noctis will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color> to counterattack.

In the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color>, the rightmost single orb will be converted into an <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color>. The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will be converted into a <color=#D91414>Blast Orb</color> 2.5s later.

The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will mark a single orb. Pinging the <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will ping the marked orb as well and cast <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> afterward, dealing Lightning DMG.
Launches a violent attack at the target in front, dealing Lightning DMG.

Press and hold Basic Attack while casting <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderclap Strike</color>, gaining Super Armor, dealing Lightning DMG, and receiving 1 <color=#D91414>Engine Point</color>. <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> will amplify Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Skull Crush</color>.

SpecificDes: Echo and <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> attack at the same time, dealing Physical DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, Echo gains <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>.\n- Deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Fires multiple arrows at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and healing HP.
SpecificDes: Fires multiple arrows at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and healing HP.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and heals for <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of ATK in total.

Title: Cipher of Synergy: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
Sinbreaker's Judgment: <color=#0d70bc>During Tactical Cipher + Ping Cipher Orbs consecutively</color>
Majestic Splendor: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + Ping Orbs</color>
Swift Archery: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + Tap Dodge</color>
Judgment Co-Strike: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + 90 Splendor Points + Ping One Specific Signal Orb</color>
Blessing of Fortitude: <color=#0d70bc>Upon receiving Healing</color>
BriefDes: <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>. In <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> will make <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fire a swordwave at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then act based on the color of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged.

Upon entering <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which time <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Afterward, Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction. Cooldown: <color=#D91414>5</color>s. Keep pinging <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> or drag the joystick to keep charging. When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color>, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then attack in the order of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged, with each attack consuming one <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color>. After Echo exits the battlefield, <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will stay and continue to attack enemies until all <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> are consumed.
Each orb pinged inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will generate <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, max <color=#D91414>90</color>.
Tapping Dodge inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Swift Archery</color>, dealing Physical DMG.

At max <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color>. The first <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> after <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is activated will cast <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>. If Echo has <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>, she can trigger another <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> afterward while the <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is still active to cast <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.

Allies are granted <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> which increases their Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.
SpecificDes:
<color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>. In <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> will make <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fire a swordwave at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then act based on the color of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged.
- Each swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Red Cipher</color>: Launches a thrust attack at the enemy, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Yellow Cipher</color>: Launches a downward thrust from above, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Blue Cipher</color>: Slashes the target, restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of Echo's ATK to allies and dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Physical DMG.

Upon entering <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which time <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction. Cooldown: <color=#D91414>5</color>s. Keep pinging <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> or drag the joystick to keep charging. When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color>, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then attack in the order of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged, with each attack consuming one <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color>. After Echo exits the battlefield, <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will stay and continue to attack enemies until all <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> are consumed.\n- When fully charged, <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG, rearranges all Signal Orbs into 3-Pings, and activates <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color>, which heals allies within for <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Echo's ATK for <color=#D91414>8</color>s and grants Echo <color=#D91414>6</color> Signature Energy.\n- If <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color> is not fully charged, it will only deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG without activating Judgment Zone.
Each orb pinged inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will generate <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, max <color=#D91414>90</color>.
Tapping Dodge inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Swift Archery</color>, dealing Physical DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.

At max <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color>. The first <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> after <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is activated will cast <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>. If Echo has <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>, she can trigger another <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> afterward while the <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is still active to cast <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>: Consumes all <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color> to imprison and pull in nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>36</color> Signature Energy.
- <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>: Consumes <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color> to leap and shoot the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy.
- Echo becomes invincible during a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> but cannot cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>.
- Echo gains <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color> after casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>.

Allies are granted <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> which increases their Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.

Title: Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Ping Red Orb</color>
BriefDes: Uses Halberd Blade to direct multiple undercurrents to strike enemies ahead, dealing Dark DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small number of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>. Enters <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> after pinging 3 Signal Orbs.
SpecificDes:
Uses Halberd Blade to direct multiple undercurrents to strike enemies ahead, dealing Dark DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small number of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>. Enters <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> after pinging 3 Signal Orbs.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains <color=#D91414>10</color>/<color=#D91414>20</color>/<color=#D91414>30</color> Fathomless Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains <color=#D91414>15</color> Abyssal Points upon a 3-Ping.

Title: Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Ping Yellow Orb</color>
BriefDes: Upon a 1-Ping or 2-Ping, glides along waves to deal Dark DMG to enemies ahead. Upon a 3-Ping, rides up a tide to leap into the air, then glides downward to launch a large-area slash, dealing Dark DMG. Making a Yellow 3-Ping after a Yellow 1/2-Ping allows Lamia to directly perform the slash attack. While casting this skill, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small amount of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>.

While casting this skill, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small amount of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>.
