Title: Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Abyssal Currents: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Ocean's Scar + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Launches melee attacks and ranged water elemental attacks with Halberd Blade, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When the weather is <color=#D91414>Downpour</color> or <color=#D91414>Storm</color>, bonus attacks are launched at certain Basic Attack sequences.

Launches fierce melee attacks, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> can be consumed to enhance Basic Attacks, dealing increased DMG while granting bonus Signature Energy. When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>, casting Basic Attacks grants her Extra DMG Bonus, Super Armor and DMG Reduction, after which she will leave <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>.

When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, consuming all <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> and dealing DMG. Each <color=#D91414>Abyssal Point</color> consumed also increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>. While casting <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, Lamia is invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sunken Finale</color>.
SpecificDes:
Launches melee attacks and ranged water elemental attacks with Halberd Blade, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When the weather is <color=#D91414>Downpour</color> or <color=#D91414>Storm</color>, additional attacks are launched at certain hits of Basic Attack.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.
- In <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>, each hit of the 4th sequence of Basic Attack deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> bonus Dark DMG.

Launches fierce melee attacks, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> can be consumed to enhance Basic Attacks, dealing increased DMG while granting bonus Signature Energy. When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>, casting Basic Attacks grants her Extra DMG Bonus, after which she will leave <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.
- Enhanced Basic Attacks have <color=#D91414>20%</color> increased Base DMG.
- While enhanced, <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> are consumed every <color=#D91414>0.5</color>s.
- While enhanced, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy every <color=#D91414>0.5</color>s.
- Casting one full cycle of Basic Attacks in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> grants <color=#D91414>30%</color> Extra DMG Bonus, Super Armor, and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.

When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, consuming all <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> and dealing Dark DMG. Each <color=#D91414>Abyssal Point</color> consumed also increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>. While casting <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, Lamia is invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sunken Finale</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\n- <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> have a maximum of <color=#D91414>350</color>. Each <color=#D91414>Abyssal Point</color> increases Base DMG by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.

Title: Antinomy
Wave Illusions
Drowned Conformation: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Ping Torrent Orb/Tidal Orb</color>
Dark Flux: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Ping Torrent Orb/Tidal Orb</color>
BriefDes: When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When she is in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she can only cast Red or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Red or Blue Orbs. Yellow Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Blue Orbs.

When Lamia casts a 3-Ping skill in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, there is a short window of time in which she can consecutively cast another 3-Ping, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> skill. After Lamia casts a Red Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, consecutively pinging Red Orbs allows her to cast the skill again directly during the skill action. After Lamia casts a Blue Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will start swimming in water, during which she can cast the skill again to rapidly fire water spheres to attack the target.

When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color>, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front while also dealing a small amount of DMG to herself. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> is pinged, she will cast <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color> to pull in surrounding enemies, then detonate the undercurrents to deal Dark DMG. After casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Storm</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>.

When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. When <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> are both present, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will be pinged to enhance <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, turning it into <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color>, slashing to create powerful airflows, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front, and entering <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing Dark DMG. If Lamia is not in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> when casting <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, she will ascend to the highest point to cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color> and then exit <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> after casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction when casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>.

Title: Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>
BriefDes: Quickly slashes forward multiple times, dealing Fire DMG in a large area. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, dealing Extra Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>.
SpecificDes:
Quickly slashes forward multiple times, dealing Fire DMG in a large area. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, dealing Extra Fire DMG.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.
- <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>.

Title: Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>
BriefDes: Charges toward the target and rapidly bombards the area in front, dealing Fire DMG. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, dealing bonus Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.
SpecificDes:
Charges toward the target and rapidly bombards the area in front, dealing Fire DMG. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, dealing bonus Fire DMG.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.
- <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.

Title: Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Blue Orb automatically pinged upon casting Signature - Ethereal Star</color>
BriefDes: When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>, deals extra Fire DMG once based on the number of Blue Orbs present.
SpecificDes:
When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>, deals extra Fire DMG once based on the number of Blue Orbs present.
- When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>, Blue Orbs are converted into <color=#D91414>Entangled Hearts</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- The Base DMG of this attack increases by 100% for every <color=#D91414>Entangled Heart</color> consumed.
- Blue Orbs <color=#D91414>cannot</color> be manually pinged.

Title: Photon Hurricane: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Photon Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Blazing Heart + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
Photon Cannon: <color=#0d70bc>Upon Photon Strike landing + Upon releasing Basic Attack or at the end of Basic Attack's 3rd Hit + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Skycrushing Blade: <color=#0d70bc>During post-action of Burst Drive + Tap Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Attacks the target with the Bladed Cannon, dealing Fire DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color>.

Consumes <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color> to quickly slash the target before leaping into the air to fire the cannon, dealing Fire DMG. When there is sufficient Dodge Gauge, consumes <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge to dodge incoming attacks during the slash.

Charges briefly to fire a powerful blast toward the target, dealing Fire DMG, gaining additional Signature Energy, and gaining Super Armor for a short duration. <color=#D91414>While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike</color>, she gains DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released. Upon a successful block, she immediately jumps back and casts <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color>, gaining DMG Reduction during so.

Leaps into the air and hurls the giant blade forward. After charging for a brief moment, pulls the blade out to deal Fire DMG to all targets within the area. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while charging.
SpecificDes: Attacks the target with the Bladed Cannon, dealing Fire DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.\n- Gains <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color> when dealing the 4th and 5th hits of the Basic Attack, casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color>, or dodging successfully.

Consumes <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color> to quickly slash the target before leaping into the air to fire the cannon, dealing Fire DMG. When there is sufficient Dodge Gauge, consumes <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge to dodge incoming attacks during the slash.\n- The slash deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\n- Hold Basic Attack while firing the cannon to fire up to <color=#D91414>10</color> additional shots, each shot dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.

Charges briefly to fire a powerful blast toward the target, dealing Fire DMG, gaining additional Signature Energy, and gaining Super Armor for a short duration. <color=#D91414>While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike</color>, she gains DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG to enemies along the path.
- Gains an extra <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy.
- <color=#D91414>While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike</color>, she gains <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released. Upon a successful block, she immediately jumps back and casts <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during so.

Leaps into the air and hurls the giant blade forward. After charging for a brief moment, pulls the blade out to deal Fire DMG to all targets within the area.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG when hurling the giant blade.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG when pulling the blade out.
- Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while charging.

Title: Burst Drive: <color=#0d70bc>10 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Ethereal Star: <color=#0d70bc>Azure Awakening + Blue Orbs available + Press and hold/tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Unleashes a powerful thrust toward the target in front, dealing Fire DMG and activating <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>. Becomes invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Burst Drive</color>.

Charges the Rock Cannon and automatically consumes all <color=#D91414>Entangled Hearts</color> and Signature Energy to fire a powerful blast toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>. Becomes Invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>.
SpecificDes:
Unleashes a powerful thrust toward the target in front, dealing Fire DMG and activating <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>. Becomes invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Burst Drive</color>.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414>15%</color> in <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color> lasts <color=#D91414>10</color>s.

Charges the Rock Cannon and automatically consumes all <color=#D91414>Entangled Hearts</color> and Signature Energy to fire a powerful blast toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. Becomes Invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color> cannot be cast while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, or <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade</color>.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Quickly launches powerful slashes toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG.
SpecificDes: Quickly launches powerful slashes toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.

Title: Reflective Nebula
Limit Released
Enhanced Blast
BriefDes: While performing a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping, pinging Red/Yellow Orbs again can interrupt it and recast the skill, dealing DMG based on the number of orbs pinged in the interruption, as well as gaining Blue Orbs equal to the number of orbs pinged when casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.

While casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, deals Extra Fire DMG based on the total number of orbs pinged during the entire action sequence (including both the original skill and the recast skill after interruption).

Casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Hurricane, Basic Attack - Photon Strike, Basic Attack - Photon Cannon, Astral Edge, and Stellar Cross</color> will accumulate Blast Energy. When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> and <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deplete the Blast Energy and deal increased Base DMG.
SpecificDes:
While performing a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping, pinging Red/Yellow Orbs again can interrupt it and recast the skill, dealing DMG based on the number of orbs pinged in the interruption, as well as gaining Blue Orbs equal to the number of orbs pinged when casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.
- Blue Orbs are located above the Red/Yellow Orbs and <color=#D91414>cannot be manually pinged</color>.
- Blue Orbs cannot be generated through any other source. Basic Attacks can only generate Red/Yellow Orbs.
- Each Red/Yellow 3-Ping can be interrupted up to <color=#D91414>2 times</color>.
- Blue Orbs are still generated if a 3-Ping, <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> is interrupted by dodging.

While casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, deals Extra Fire DMG based on the total number of orbs pinged during the entire action sequence (including both the original skill and the recast skill after interruption).
- Deals one extra hit of DMG for every orb pinged.
- Each extra hit deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>.
- Each extra hit deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG while casting <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.

Casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Hurricane, Basic Attack - Photon Strike, Basic Attack - Photon Cannon, Astral Edge, and Stellar Cross</color> will accumulate Blast Energy. When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> and <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deal increased Base DMG.
- Blast Energy has a maximum value of <color=#D91414>1000</color>.
- Each Basic Attack grants <color=#D91414>14</color> Blast Energy. Each <color=#D91414>shot</color> fired in <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Strike</color> grants <color=#D91414>21</color> Blast Energy. <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color> grants <color=#D91414>74</color> Blast Energy.
- When casting <color=#D91414>Astral Edge</color>, <color=#D91414>Stellar Cross</color>, or when triggering <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Reflective Nebula</color>, gains <color=#D91414>100/200/334</color> Blast Energy based on the number of orbs pinged.
- When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deplete the Blast Energy and increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.

Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color> and <color=#D91414>Entangled Heart</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.

Title: Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>
Thermal Erosion: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blaze Orb</color>
BriefDes: Leaps into the air using a grappling hook, then slashes the enemy to deal Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. Tapping Basic Attack during this skill immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Flaming Bombardment</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color>, granting a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again replenishes the Shield's capacity.

Swings the blade consecutively to unleash fire and pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG while inflicting the targets hit with <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. While casting this skill, Watanabe gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction. After casting, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> and <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>.
SpecificDes: Leaps into the air using a grappling hook, then slashes the enemy to deal Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. Tapping Basic Attack during this skill immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Flaming Bombardment</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color>, granting a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again replenishes the Shield's capacity.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\n- Pinging orbs consecutively will change the actions of this skill: Watanabe uses his grappling hook and Trailblade to perform consecutive slashing attacks, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Fire DMG in total.

Swings the blade consecutively to unleash fire and pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG while inflicting the targets hit with <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. While casting this skill, Watanabe gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction. After casting, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> and <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Title: Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>
BriefDes: Spins and slashes continuously, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing Fire DMG.
SpecificDes: Spins and slashes continuously, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing Fire DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.

Title: Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>
BriefDes: Kicks the enemy away, then spins and slashes to deal Fire DMG.
SpecificDes: Kicks the enemy away, then spins and slashes to deal Fire DMG.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.

Title: Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Flaming Bombardment: <color=#0d70bc>Have Shotshell + Tap Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Unleashes a combination of attacks with Trailblade and shotgun, dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead under <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>).

If <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> is available when Watanabe performs a Basic Attack, consumes 1 <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> to shoot at the target, dealing Fire DMG while granting 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy. If there are already 3 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, this shot will not consume <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> but will not generate <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> or Signature Energy.
SpecificDes: Unleashes a combination of attacks with Trailblade and shotgun, dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead under <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>).\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG in total under <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>.

If <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> is available when Watanabe performs a Basic Attack, consumes 1 <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> to shoot at the target, dealing Fire DMG while granting 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy. If there are already 3 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, this shot will not consume <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> but will not generate <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> or Signature Energy.\n- The shot deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.

Title: Core Awakening: <color=#0d70bc>15 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Explosive Purge: <color=#0d70bc>100 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Releases the Core Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>, dealing Fire DMG to nearby enemy units and inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.

Dashes across enemy units and attacks them, pulling them together and dealing Fire DMG. After the attack, forms a <color=#D91414>Firepower Bulwark</color> that deals continuous DMG, then activates <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.
SpecificDes: Releases the Core Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>, dealing Fire DMG to nearby enemy units and inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s.

Dashes across enemy units and attacks them, pulling them together and dealing Fire DMG. After the attack, forms a <color=#D91414>Firepower Bulwark</color> that deals DMG continuously, then activates <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.\n- The dashing attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color> by <color=#D91414>50%</color>, stacking up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. <color=#D91414>Firepower Bulwark</color> bombards the target every 3s over 12s, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG each time. Each bombardment leaves behind a fire that deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG every 0.5s over 3s.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Spins and slashes continuously to pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG to the target while inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance.
SpecificDes: Spins and slashes continuously to pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG to the target while inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Title: Composite Structure
Engine Optimization: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping or upon entering Matrix</color>
Fire Walker: <color=#0d70bc>Assault Mode + Press and hold Dodge</color>
Resilient Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Trigger Parry</color>
Scorching Torrent: <color=#0d70bc>Assault Mode + Have 3 Shotshells + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Under <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>, Watanabe can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs, and his Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color> is activated, he can only use Red and <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, and his Basic Attacks only generate Red Orbs.

After any 3-Ping, Watanabe: Epitaph gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color>, up to <color=#D91414>3</color>. Upon entering Matrix, he gains 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color>. He may have up to <color=#D91414>3</color> <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> at the same time, and excess <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> will be converted into random Signal Orbs.

Uses the grappling hook to pull in the target from a distance, dealing Fire DMG. If the target cannot be pulled, Watanabe: Epitaph will dash toward the target instead. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction while casting this skill. Using Basic Attack or Red Orb skill during the pulling action immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Parry</color>.

Upon <color=#D91414>Parry</color>, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> that grants a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP, deals Fire DMG, and inflicts <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces the target's Fire Resistance. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again will replenish the Shield capacity. Enters Matrix if it is not on cooldown when Fortified Shield is triggered.

Uses the grappling hook to glide around and descends from above, consuming <color=#D91414>3</color> Shotshells to pull in nearby enemy units and deal Fire DMG. While casting <color=#D91414>Scorching Torrent</color>, Watanabe becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy after casting.
SpecificDes: Under <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>, Watanabe can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs, and his Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color> is activated, he can only use Red and <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, and his Basic Attacks only generate Red Orbs.

BriefDes: Increases Fire DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.

Title: <color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>
<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>

<color=#99a3b1>Acts faster when casting Thermal Erosion consecutively. Title: Enlightened Soul: <color=#0d70bc>70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Sovereign's Presence: <color=#0d70bc>Enthronement + Tap Signature or Cast Automatically When Enthronement Ends</color>
BriefDes: Begins <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, dealing Ice DMG to units in a large surrounding area continuously. Briefly triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. Meanwhile, each <color=#D91414>Glyph</color> is converted into a set of 3-Ping placed at the front of the row. During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs or performing Basic Attacks will summon Tabula Vestige to deal the target Ice DMG. However, Signature Energy cannot be gained, and 3-Pings will grant <color=#D91414>Soul Ripple</color>.

Qu: Shukra gathers the Will of Kowloong and consumes all <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, dealing Ice DMG to enemies in a large area and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. If this is cast during Into the Fray, Qu: Shukra exits it immediately. If there are fewer than 4 stacks of <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, clears all Signal Orbs converted from <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>.
SpecificDes:
Begins <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, dealing Ice DMG to units in a large surrounding area continuously. Briefly triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. Meanwhile, each <color=#D91414>Glyph</color> is converted into a set of 3-Ping placed at the front of the row. During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs or performing Basic Attacks will summon Tabula Vestige to deal the target Ice DMG. However, Signature Energy cannot be gained, and 3-Pings will grant <color=#D91414>Soul Ripple</color>.
- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total to units in a large surrounding area.
- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged, and Basic Attack deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Ice DMG.
- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, each 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1 stack of Soul Ripple</color>, up to 4.
- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, performs up to <color=#D91414>4</color> pings or Basic Attacks.

Qu: Shukra gathers the Will of Kowloong and consumes all <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, dealing Ice DMG to enemies in a large area and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. If there are fewer than 4 stacks of <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, clears all Signal Orbs converted from <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\n- For <color=#D91414>each stack of Soul Ripple</color> consumed, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.

Sun Rider
Will Bearer: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + During Sunshift + Press and Hold Dodge</color>
Snow Drifter: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + Inscription Not Full + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Mountain Caller: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + Inscription Full + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: After a 3-Ping, pings any Signal Orb immediately to cast <color=#D91414>Tabula Akasha - Engrave</color> and summons Huiyu to attack the target, gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction, rearranging Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets, entering <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, and gaining 1 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> and 1 Signal Orb during so. During <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, any 3-Ping will grant <color=#D91414>Inscription</color>, and Huiyu will deal Extra Ice DMG upon a 3-Ping or the 4th-or-5th hit of the Basic Attack.
Upon entering a Matrix she has triggered, Qu: Shukra activates <color=#D91414>Sunshift</color> for 4s. Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy every time she is switched in.

Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra pulls in enemy units and summons feathers to continue attacking the target, dealing Ice DMG and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color> cast is enhanced.

Qu: Shukra assumes her sword stance and becomes Invincible briefly before dashing toward her target and leaping into the air, striking the target and dealing Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during this skill.

Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra summons an ice mountain that freezes the target briefly before she shatters the mountain, pulling in enemy units, dealing Ice DMG, and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> cast is enhanced.
SpecificDes:
After a 3-Ping, pings any Signal Orb immediately to cast <color=#D91414>Tabula Akasha - Engrave</color> and summons Huiyu to attack the target, gaining Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction, rearranging Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets, entering <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, and gaining 1 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> and 1 Signal Orb during so. During <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, any 3-Ping will grant <color=#D91414>Inscription</color>, and Huiyu will deal Extra Ice DMG upon a 3-Ping or the 4th-or-5th hit of the Basic Attack.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged when summoning Huiyu.
- Huiyu performs a follow-up attack and deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ice DMG upon a Red/Yellow/Blue 3-Ping.
- Huiyu performs a follow-up attack and deals <color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Ice DMG upon the 4th/5th hit of the Basic Attack.
- Pings orbs during the Entrance Skill to enter <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> immediately.
- <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> lasts for 8s. Gains up to 3 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> during so.
Upon entering a Matrix she has triggered, Qu: Shukra activates <color=#D91414>Sunshift</color> for 4s. Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy every time she is switched in.

Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra pulls in enemy units and summons feathers to continue attacking the target, dealing Ice DMG and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color> cast is enhanced.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.
- Each attack grants <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy.
- For the next cast of <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color>, every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>2 stacks of Soul Ripples</color> during <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>. This effect does not stack with the enhancement to <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> triggered by <color=#D91414>Mountain Caller</color>.

Qu: Shukra assumes her sword stance and becomes Invincible briefly before dashing toward her target and leaping into the air, striking the target and dealing Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during this skill.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\n- Automatically dodges during the dash.

Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra summons an ice mountain that freezes the target briefly before she shatters the mountain, pulling in enemy units, dealing Ice DMG, and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> cast is enhanced.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.
- Each attack grants <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy.

BriefDes: Ping Combo 1: Smashes the target with the Grizzly Paw before kicking the target toward Decryptor with Grizzly Stomp, dealing Dark DMG.
Ping Combo 2: Pulls in targets in the area ahead before riding the Grizzly Paw to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG.
Ping Combo 3: Leaps into the air and produces the soundwave conveyor, summoning Grizzly Chomp before throwing it at the target, dealing Dark DMG.

BriefDes: Ping Combo 1: Crosses the Grizzly Paws to pierce the target, dealing Dark DMG.
Ping Combo 2: Puts the Grizzly Paws together to crush the target, dealing Dark DMG.

Ping Combo 3: Creates a cyber tornado with both Grizzly Paws and kicks the target continuously, dealing Dark DMG. Then, summons Grizzly Chomp to fly toward herself, dealing Dark DMG to targets on the path.
SpecificDes: Ping Combo 1: Crosses the Grizzly Paws to pierce the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.
Ping Combo 2: Puts the Grizzly Paws together to crush the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.

Ping Combo 3: Creates a cyber tornado with both Grizzly Paws and kicks the target continuously, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. Then, summons Grizzly Chomp to fly toward herself, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG to targets on the path.

Title: Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Incoming Grizzly Chomp + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Coupling: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 3 Computing Points + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Overflow: <color=#0d70bc>During Coupling + Release Basic Attack, or Press and Hold Basic Attack until Coupling Ends to Auto Cast</color>
BriefDes: Uses the two Grizzly Paws alternatively to launch a 2-hit attack at the target when <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. The 3rd hit will unleash a soundwave, knocking back the target and dealing Dark DMG.\nThe 3rd hit will form a pulse that pulls in the target instead when <color=#D91414>in Analysis Mode</color>, dealing Dark DMG.
Sweeps the target with Grizzly Paws when Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing Dark DMG.

Pressing and holding Basic Attack when there are at least <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color> will spend all <color=#D91414>Computing Points</color>, performing <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> on the target, dealing Dark DMG, and restoring HP and Signature Energy to Decryptor. She gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.
- Spends <color=#D91414>3-5 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Low Frequency</color>.
- Spends <color=#D91414>6-8 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Medium Frequency</color>.
- Spends <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - High Frequency</color>.

During <color=#D91414>Coupling</color>, release Basic Attack in advance to dodge. When an Extreme Dodge is triggered, Decryptor will cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing during <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> or pressing and holding Basic Attack until <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> ends will also cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Decryptor gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> and <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> share the same Frequencies, and <color=#D91414>Computing Points</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> caused by releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing or performing Extreme Dodge.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Low Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws uppercut, dealing Dark DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Medium Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws smash, dealing Dark DMG and restoring Signature Energy.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow - High Frequency</color> unleashes a powerful Grizzly Paws smash, dealing Dark DMG, restoring Signature Energy, and generating an <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>.
- The <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> restores HP to allies every <color=#D91414>4s</color> and applies <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> and <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Disintegration</color> on them. While <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> is active, allies deal more Dark DMG for <color=#D91414>4s</color>. <color=#D91414>While Equilibrium Disintegration</color> is active, Decryptor deals massive Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>, while allies deal a moderate amount of Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>.
SpecificDes: Uses the two Grizzly Paws alternatively to launch a 2-hit attack at the target when <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. The 3rd hit will unleash a soundwave, knocking back the target and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\nThe 3rd hit will form a pulse that pulls in the target instead when <color=#D91414>in Analysis Mode</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.
Sweeps the target with Grizzly Paws when Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.

Pressing and holding Basic Attack when there are at least <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color> will spend all <color=#D91414>Computing Points</color>, performing <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> on the target, dealing Dark DMG, and restoring HP and <color=#D91414>10 Signature Energy to Decryptor</color>. She gains Super Armor and 25% DMG Reduction during so.
- Spends <color=#D91414>3-5 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Low Frequency</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.
- Spends <color=#D91414>6-8 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Medium Frequency</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of her ATK.
- Spends <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - High Frequency</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> of her ATK.

During <color=#D91414>Coupling</color>, release Basic Attack in advance to dodge. When an Extreme Dodge is triggered, Decryptor will cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing during <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> or pressing and holding Basic Attack until <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> ends will also cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Decryptor gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during so.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> and <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> share the same Frequencies, and every <color=#D91414>Computing Point</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> caused by releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing or performing Extreme Dodge by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Low Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws uppercut, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Medium Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws smash, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy.
- <color=#D91414>Overflow - High Frequency</color> unleashes a powerful Grizzly Paws smash, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>30</color> Signature Energy, and generating an <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>.
- The <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of Decryptor's ATK to allies every <color=#D91414>4s</color> and applies <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> and <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Disintegration</color> on them. While <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> is active, allies deal <color=#D91414>10%</color> more Dark DMG for <color=#D91414>4s</color>. While <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Disintegration</color> is active, Decryptor deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>, while allies deal <color=#D91414>30%</color> Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>.

Title: Thorough Analysis: <color=#0d70bc>Not in Analysis Mode + At Least 200 Signature Energy + Press and Hold Signature</color>
Chordal Dissonance: <color=#0d70bc>Analysis Mode + Press and Hold Signature, or Use Up All Signature Energy to Auto Cast</color>
Ambient Mix: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Decryptor unleashes all her computing power and enters <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, dealing Dark DMG and gaining up to <color=#D91414>150 Analysis Points</color> based on her moves during so.\n- In <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Decryptor cannot restore Signature Energy and will consume it over time (This effect stops when she leaves the battlefield).

Decryptor spends all Signature Energy and exits <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color>, dealing Dark DMG. When <color=#D91414>Analysis Points</color> reach <color=#D91414>150</color>, <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> is <color=#D91414>Played Back</color>, dealing Dark DMG again. <color=#D91414>Analysis Points</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> and <color=#D91414>Play Back</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> also detonates the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color>, dealing Dark DMG to the hacked target.

Decryptor's attacks charge the Grizzly Stomp. Casting this skill will summon Grizzly Stomp to kick the target with different strengths based on the charge level, dealing Dark DMG before resetting the charge level.\n- The charge level starts at Lv.0, increasing to level 1, 2, and 3 after 1st, 2nd, and 3rd basic attacks. Increases to Lv.4 every after gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>. Increases to Lv.5 for a limited time after Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor.
SpecificDes: Decryptor unleashes all her computing power and enters <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG and gaining up to <color=#D91414>150 Analysis Points</color> based on her moves during so.\n- In <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Decryptor cannot restore Signature Energy and will consume <color=#D91414>30 Signature Energy</color> every second (This effect stops when she leaves the battlefield).

Decryptor spends all Signature Energy and exits <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. When <color=#D91414>Analysis Points</color> reach <color=#D91414>150</color>, <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> is <color=#D91414>Played Back</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG again. Each <color=#D91414>Analysis Point</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> and <color=#D91414>Play Back</color> by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> also detonates the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG to the hacked target.

Decryptor's attacks charge the Grizzly Stomp. Casting this skill will summon Grizzly Stomp to kick the target with different strengths based on the charge level, dealing Dark DMG before resetting the charge level.\n- The charge level starts at Lv.0, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.1 after the 1st Basic Attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.2 after the 2nd Basic Attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.3 after the 3rd Basic Attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.4 every after gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.5 for a limited time after Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Dark DMG.

Title: QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Decryptor rides the Grizzly Paws to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG. Afterward, generates the <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>4s</color>.
SpecificDes: Decryptor rides the Grizzly Paws to scatter musical notes, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. Afterward, generates the <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>4s</color>.

Title: Fraudulent Frequency
Hacking: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping or QTE</color>
Programming Stack: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Orb</color>
Stress Integration: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Stress Orb</color>
Iterative Glitch: <color=#0d70bc>Incoming Grizzly Chomp + Tap Basic Attack or Signature</color>
BriefDes: Decryptor can only gain and ping Red or Yellow Orbs when she is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. She gains infinite Blue Orbs and can only ping Blue Orbs when in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>.

3-Pings and QTEs will inflict a <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the first target hit for <color=#D91414>10s</color>. When the hacked target takes damage, Decryptor will restore Signature Energy over time.\n- There can only be 1 <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the battlefield. When the hacked target is taken down, the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> will spread to the nearest target with its duration reset.

Decryptor gains <color=#D91414>1 Computing Point</color> for each orb pinged, storing up to <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> in total. After a 3-Ping, Decryptor will overload her computing power temporarily. During her next 1-Ping or 2-Ping, tap Signature to spend Signature Energy, boosting the ping's damage to a 3-Ping's and gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>.

Gains <color=#D91414>1 Stress Orb</color> after obtaining <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color>, max 1 <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> in total. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color>, Decryptor will leap up and summon the Grizzly Chomp, bombing the target and dealing Dark DMG upon landing plus Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>. She gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.\n- Pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color> will restore Signature Energy.

Ping Combo 3 will summon Grizzly Chomp to fly toward Decryptor. She can either perform an Extreme Dodge to trigger the Matrix, or knock Grizzly Chomp away with Grizzly Paws or Grizzly Stomp for a follow-up joint attack.\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal Dark DMG if knocked away by Grizzly Paws.\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal Dark DMG and restore Signature Energy to Decryptor if knocked away by Grizzly Stomp when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. If she is in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Grizzly Chomp will deal Dark DMG and extend <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> for <color=#D91414>2s</color>.
SpecificDes: Decryptor can only gain and ping Red or Yellow Orbs when she is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. She gains infinite Blue Orbs and can only ping Blue Orbs when in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>.

3-Pings and QTEs will inflict a <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the first target hit for <color=#D91414>10s</color>. When the hacked target takes damage, Decryptor will restore <color=#D91414>30 Signature Energy</color> every second.\n- There can only be 1 <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the battlefield. When the hacked target is taken down, the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> will spread to the nearest target with its duration reset.

Decryptor gains <color=#D91414>1 Computing Point</color> for each orb pinged, storing up to <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> in total. After a 3-Ping, Decryptor will overload her computing power temporarily. During her next 1-Ping or 2-Ping, tap Signature to spend <color=#D91414>15 Signature Energy</color>, boosting the ping's damage to a 3-Ping's and gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>.

Gains <color=#D91414>1 Stress Orb</color> after obtaining <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color>, max 1 <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> in total. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color>, Decryptor will leap up and summon the Grizzly Chomp, bombing the target and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG upon landing plus <color=#D91414>150%</color> Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>. She gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during so.\n- Pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color> will restore <color=#D91414>75 Signature Energy</color>.

Ping Combo 3 will summon Grizzly Chomp to fly toward Decryptor. She can either perform an Extreme Dodge to trigger the Matrix, or knock Grizzly Chomp away with Grizzly Paws or Grizzly Stomp for a follow-up joint attack.\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG if knocked away by Grizzly Paws.\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and restore <color=#D91414>60 Signature Energy</color> to Decryptor if knocked away by Grizzly Stomp when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. If she is in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Grizzly Chomp will deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and extend <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> for <color=#D91414>2s</color>.

Title: Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>
BriefDes: Wields the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.
SpecificDes:
Wields the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Retrieves the Chakram if it's present on the field.
- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Crescent Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.

Title: Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow Orb Ping</color>
BriefDes: Leaps up and hurls the Chakram at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.
SpecificDes:
Leaps up and hurls the Chakram at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- If the Chakram is present on the field when the skill is cast, slashes the enemy with the Wingblade and retrieves the Chakram instead, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Nihil DMG.
- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Crescent Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.

SpecificDes:
Dashes in and leaps up to launch a spin attack at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.

- Retrieves the Chakram if it's present on the field.

- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.

Title: Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Lunar Assault: <color=#0d70bc>In Main Sequence/Finality + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Reaping Moon: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Shattering Moon: <color=#0d70bc>Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack</color>
Gibbous Edge: <color=#0d70bc>2nd hit of Basic Attack/Yellow Orb Skill</color>
BriefDes: Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to slash the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. If the Chakram is present on the field, the 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional Crescent Points.

Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.

Press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, continuously pulling in nearby enemies and granting <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. During so, Luna: Oblivion gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and triggers Dodge automatically when hit.

During <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, release Basic Attack at <color=#D91414>0/45/90</color> <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion slowly ascends into the air to execute a plunging attack, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Nihil DMG. During so, she gains Super Armor, <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.
After casting the 2nd hit of Basic Attack or Yellow Orb Skill, the Chakram remains on the field, continuously dealing Nihil DMG. When the Chakram is present, Basic Attack starts from the 3rd hit.
SpecificDes: Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to slash the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. If the Chakram is present on the field, the 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional Crescent Points.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG. The 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional <color=#D91414>20 Crescent Points</color>.

Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional <color=#D91414>20 Crescent Points</color>.

Press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, continuously pulling in nearby enemies and granting <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. During so, Luna: Oblivion gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and triggers Dodge automatically when hit.\n- During <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, restores <color=#D91414>40 Crescent Points</color> per second.\n- Can gain up to <color=#D91414>90</color> <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.

During <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, release Basic Attack at <color=#D91414>0/45/90</color> <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion slowly ascends into the air to execute a plunging attack, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Nihil DMG. During so, she gains Super Armor, <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.
- Casts <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> automatically at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.
- When in <color=#D91414>Nova</color>, <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG.
- When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion changes her attacks, slashing enemies with the Wingblade in a large area instead and dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Nihil DMG.
- Becomes invincible upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. This will clear all <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color>, and restore <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy.

After casting the 2nd hit of Basic Attack or Yellow Orb Skill, the Chakram remains on the field, continuously dealing Nihil DMG. When the Chakram is present, Basic Attack starts from the 3rd hit.\n- The Chakram deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG to nearby enemies every 0.5s for 1.5s.

Title: Main Sequence: <color=#0d70bc>30 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Finality: <color=#0d70bc>30 Energy + Press and Hold Signature</color>
Lunar Downfall: <color=#0d70bc>In Main Sequence/Finality + 70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Crushes spacial dimensions to pull all enemies into the Starfall Dome, dealing Nihil DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the duration and enters <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>.

Tears apart dimensional bounds at the cost of all present Signal Orbs to pull all enemies into the Starfall Dome, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. After casting this skill, gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged, increases <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to the max limit, activates <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color>, and enters <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.

Condenses consciousness to implode and obliterate space, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, exits <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color> and enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color>. When cast in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, this skill's damage will be amplified at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.

Condenses consciousness to implode and obliterate space, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, exits <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color> and enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color>. When cast in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, this skill's damage will be amplified at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\n- When cast in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, every <color=#D91414>10 Eclipse Points</color> will amplify Base DMG by <color=#D91414>4%</color>.

BriefDes: Slashes the enemy with the Wingblade, dealing Nihil DMG.

Title: Waxing Course
Eclipse Points: <color=#0d70bc>Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/casting Shattering Moon at max Crescent Points</color>
Incipient Retribution: <color=#0d70bc>Main Sequence + Activated Eclipse Stance + Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack</color>
Final Retribution: <color=#0d70bc>Finality + Activated Eclipse Stance + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Serene Advent: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Signature - Finality</color>
Agitated Beacon
BriefDes: Enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color> upon entering the battlefield. When in <color=#D91414>Nova</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Yellow Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Yellow Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Red and Blue Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Red or Blue Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Basic Attacks will not generate Signal Orbs, and no Signal Orbs can be pinged except for <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color>.

Gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> whenever casting Signal Orb Skills, or casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> or <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. Eclipse Points will amplify the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color> in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> and the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.

When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, release Basic Attack during <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.

When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and amplifying this damage at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.

When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion consumes <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> continuously but is unable to gain them back through <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon Basic Attacks; restores <color=#D91414>30 Crescent Points</color> and gains 3 <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. When the number of <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> falls to 0, exits <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, and all <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> will disappear.
When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.
SpecificDes: Enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color> upon entering the battlefield. - When <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> are not full, <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.

- Casts <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> automatically at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.

She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG. Every <color=#D91414>10 Eclipse Points</color> will amplify Base DMG by <color=#D91414>4%</color>.

When the number of <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> falls to 0, exits <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, and all <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> will disappear.\n- In <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, expends <color=#D91414>10 Crescent Points</color> per second.\n- Casts <color=#D91414>Void Dissipation</color> upon pinging a <color=#D91414>Finality Orb</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>20 Crescent Points</color>. When <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> is activated, gains additional <color=#D91414>15 Eclipse Points</color>.
When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.

Title: Fearless Fighter: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 1 Red Orb + Press and Hold Red Orb + Release Red Orb</color>
Detect and Counter: <color=#0d70bc>Take Hit During Fearless Fighter</color>
BriefDes: Starts charging upon pressing and holding a Red Orb, then performs a shield bash upon releasing it, consuming 1/2/3 Red Orb(s) based on the charging time to deal Fire DMG. Additionally, applies <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance.\n- Fearless Fighter will convert up to <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> into <color=#D91414>Flash Points</color> for each Red Orb consumed. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Flash Points</color>. Each converted <color=#D91414>Fortification Point</color> increases the Base DMG of Fearless Fighter and restores Signature Energy to Ardeo.\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Upon taking a hit during charging, automatically performs a counterattack. Bridget: Ardeo leaps up and smashes the ground, spending up to 3 Red Orbs, recovering <color=#D91414>90 Signature Energy</color>, and dealing Fire DMG. Additionally, applies <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.
If she takes a hit during the precast of the charge, the counterattack becomes a rapid assault instead. Bridget unleashes a wave of flame forward, dealing additional Fire DMG. Becomes Invincible during so.
- Detect and Counter will convert up to <color=#D91414>150 Fortification Points</color> into <color=#D91414>Flash Points</color>. Bridget can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Flash Points</color>. Each converted <color=#D91414>Fortification Point</color> will increase the Base DMG of Detect and Counter.
- Detect and Counter is always considered a 3-Ping.
- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Title: Fortify: <color=#0d70bc>Not Moving + Press and Hold Dodge</color>
Discharge
Effect: Ignition
BriefDes:
Bridget: Ardeo blocks the attack with her Tactical Tonfas. She cannot move or restore Dodge Gauge during so, and Dodge Gauge is consumed based on the DMG prevented and her max HP when hit (Dodge Gauge is not consumed on a precise block).
- If there is enough Dodge Gauge, Bridget: Ardeo is immune to the hit upon a successful block. Otherwise, she gains DMG Reduction for the hit instead.
- After a successful block, recovers <color=#D91414>100 Fortification Points</color>, and an additional <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> on a precise block. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Fortification Points</color>.
- When she enters the battlefield, restores her <color=#D91414>Fortification Points</color> to <color=#D91414>150</color> if it is below <color=#D91414>150</color>.

After being thrown, the Energy Shield will stay on the field and gain 6 Durability.
- Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike can launch the Energy Shield, recovering <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> and consuming 1 Durability.
- The Energy Shield can trigger Detect and Counter and Fortify, consuming 1 Durability.
- Triggers available Matrix upon an Extreme Dodge on the Energy Shield.
- When Bridget: Ardeo recovers the Energy Shield, she receives a shield and gains 1 Blue Orb.

Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.

SpecificDes:
Quickly plays the chords to deal Physical DMG. While casting this skill, consumes 1 White Orb and grants Super Armor, gaining <color=#D91414>Sonority</color> and <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. When cast in the Matrix, instantly gains 2 White Orbs and triggers a 3-Ping.
- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.
- Once cast, gains <color=#D91414>15 Sonority</color> and <color=#D91414>5 Sharp Reserve</color>.
- When cast in the Matrix, gains <color=#D91414>45 Sonority</color> and <color=#D91414>15 Sharp Reserve</color>.

BriefDes: Spins and plays the chords to deal Physical DMG, and can dodge attacks during the spin. Casting requires at least 1 White Orb and grants <color=#D91414>Sonority</color> and <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> based on the number of White Orbs consumed. When cast in the Matrix, only 1 White Orb is consumed and is regarded as a 3-Ping.

BriefDes: Draws the Hairpin and enters <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color> to launch a surprise attack on the target, dealing Physical DMG and triggering a <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If the target has a <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color>, consumes one <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to guarantee a critical hit and increase Base DMG by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.

After a series of dashes, unleashes a final blow, pulling nearby enemies together and dealing Physical DMG. A <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered during this attack. Once cast, quits <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.
