Title: Eradication: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Pulls nearby enemies together and deals Physical DMG. Inflicts <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> that reduces the target's Physical Defense and <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color> that reduces the target's Physical Resistance.
SpecificDes:
Pulls nearby enemies together and deals Physical DMG. Inflicts <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> that reduces the target's Physical Defense and <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color> that reduces the target's Physical Resistance.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.
- <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> reduces the target's Physical Defense by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.
- <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color> reduces the target's Physical Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Title: Ethereal Elegance
Open String: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Harmonic Orbs</color>
Jade Bloom: <color=#0d70bc>Attacker Mode + 30 Sonority + Tap Signature</color>
Ethereal Symphony: <color=#0d70bc>Lunartone Field + Jade Bloom: Full</color>
Ringing: <color=#0d70bc>Attacker Mode + Dream Mark + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Effect: Ultima Slash
BriefDes: When in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into White Orbs. When in <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into Blue Orbs. Gains a <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction while Hanying: Solacetune has a shield.

Gains the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color> after pinging 6 White Orbs. While a <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> exists, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color>, the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> will unfold. While the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> exists, it will weaken enemy units within the field and strengthen friendly units. When <color=#D91414>Hanying: Solacetune</color> leaves or casts <color=#D91414>Signature - Moon Chill</color>, exits the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.

Basic Attack and Signal Orb Skill generate <color=#D91414>Sonority</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>120 points</color>. In <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, tapping Signature button consumes <color=#D91414>30 Sonority</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target. A successful hit triggers <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>. While casting Jade Bloom, gains Super Armor and can dodge attacks. Consecutive casting of Jade Bloom increase its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>50%</color> each time, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. Once the maximum damage is reached, subsequent casting will maintain this highest damage. Each casting grants <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy. Consecutive casting doubles the amount of Signature Energy gained, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>40</color> Energy per casting.

Within the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>, activating <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>. This will send out shockwaves, drawing nearby enemies, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and applying 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to each target. This mark can stack up to 3 times on a single target. At the same time, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color>, which can stack up to 3 times. By dodging <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>, Hanying: Solacetune enters the Matrix.

Basic Attacks against enemies with the <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Ringing</color>. Once cast, Super Armor is activated. On hit, all <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks on the target and all stacks of inherent <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> are consumed. The attack deals Ultima Slash DMG based on the number of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks and restores Signal Orbs based on the number of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> stacks.

Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>999</color> points.
SpecificDes: When in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into White Orbs. When in <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into Blue Orbs. Gains a <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction while Hanying: Solacetune has a shield.

Gains the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color> after pinging 6 White Orbs. While a <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> exists, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color>, the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> will unfold. While the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> exists, it will weaken enemy units within the field and strengthen friendly units. When <color=#D91414>Hanying: Solacetune</color> leaves or casts <color=#D91414>Signature - Moon Chill</color>, exits the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.
- While Lunartone Field is unfolding, Super Armor is activated and applies 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>55 Sharp Reserve</color>.
- Inflicts <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> on enemies within the field every second, reducing their Physical Defense by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s; inflicts <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color>, reducing their Physical Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. The duration resets every time the effect is triggered again.
- Friendly units within the field gain the <color=#D91414>Lamplight & Moonlight</color> effect and gain 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Returning Clouds</color> effect every second.
- <color=#D91414>Lamplight & Moonlight</color>: Increases <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve accumulation speed by 50%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. The duration resets every time the effect is triggered again.
- <color=#D91414>Returning Clouds</color>: Gains a shield equal to 5% of maximum HP of Hanying: Solacetune. Stacks up to 4 times. Each stack lasts for <color=#D91414>3</color>s. The duration resets every time the effect is triggered again.

Basic Attack and Signal Orb Skill generate <color=#D91414>Sonority</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>120 points</color>. In <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, tapping Signature button consumes <color=#D91414>30 Sonority</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target. A successful hit triggers <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>. While casting Jade Bloom, gains Super Armor and can dodge attacks. Consecutive casting of Jade Bloom increases its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>50%</color> each time, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. Once the maximum damage is reached, subsequent casting will maintain this highest damage. Each casting grants <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy. Consecutive casting doubles the amount of Signature Energy gained, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>40</color> Energy per casting.
- <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. A successful hit <color=#D91414>triggers Ultima Slash</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color>: When <color=#D91414>Sonority</color> reaches its maximum, cast to trigger one <color=#D91414>Phoenix Tail Dragon Fragrance</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Play</color>: After casting <color=#D91414>the fourth Basic Attack/Blue 3-Ping Orbs</color>, a <color=#D91414>Chime Mark</color> will briefly appear. During this time, casting <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color> will cast a clone to attack together, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.

Within the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>, activating <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>. This will send out shockwaves, drawing nearby enemies, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and applying 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to each target. This mark can stack up to 3 times on a single target. At the same time, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color>, which can stack up to 3 times. By dodging <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>, Hanying: Solacetune enters the Matrix.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.

Basic Attacks against enemies with the <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Ringing</color>. Once cast, Super Armor is activated. On hit, all <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks on the target and all stacks of inherent <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> are consumed. The attack deals Ultima Slash DMG based on the number of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks and restores Signal Orbs based on the number of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> stacks.
- <color=#D91414>Ringing</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. A successful hit <color=#D91414>triggers Ultima Slash</color>.
- The Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ringing</color> increases by <color=#D91414>0%/150%/300%</color> based on the number of consumed <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks.
- Recover <color=#D91414>2/3/4</color> Signal Orbs based on the number of consumed <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> stacks.

Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>999</color> points.\n- When <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> reaches <color=#D91414>100</color> points, the next skill with a <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> effect that hits an enemy will consume <color=#D91414>100 points of Sharp Reserve</color> to trigger a <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.\n- Gains 1 point of <color=#D91414>Truewill</color> each time it triggers, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>90</color> points.

BriefDes: Increases Physical DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.
SpecificDes: Increases Physical DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.

BriefDes: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction.
SpecificDes: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s.

Title: Flurry Blitz: <color=#0d70bc>Calibration Mode + Ping Red Orb</color>
Revolver Launch: <color=#0d70bc>Backup Revolver + Calibration Mode + Cylinder Empty + Tap Red Orb</color>
Shattered Light: <color=#0d70bc>Backup Revolver + Calibration Mode + Frosty Barrage Active + Cylinder Empty + Tap Red Orb</color>
Fleeting Flash: <color=#0d70bc>Calibration Mode Inactive + While Dodging + Ping Red Orb</color>
BriefDes: Shoots <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color> to deal Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. On consecutive casts, enters <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color> to gain Super Armor, DMG Reduction and <color=#D91414>Maim</color>, while gaining additional Signature Energy.

Commands the drone to launch the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color>, consuming it in the process. While casting, freezes <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color>, pulls enemies and deals Ice DMG. After catching it, swaps the revolver, refills the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and renews the duration of <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>.

Consumes the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color> to refill the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and consumes a <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color>. While casting, becomes Invincible, and the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> is frozen, while dealing Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> and gaining Signature Energy. When <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color> is active, tap Red Orb again to command the drone to launch the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color>, pulling enemies and dealing Ice DMG. While casting, the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> is frozen. After catching it, swaps the revolver to refill the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and renew the duration of <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>.
Projects a drone to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG. After casting, gains<color=#D91414> Condensation Projectiles</color>.
SpecificDes:
Shoots <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color> to deal Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. On consecutive casts, enters <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color> to gain Super Armor, <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction and <color=#D91414>Maim</color>, while gaining additional Signature Energy.
- In <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>, shots deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.
- In <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, shots deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>.
- On consecutive casts, enters <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color> to gain <color=#D91414>Maim</color>, increasing the Base DMG of the next <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> by <color=#D91414>7.5%</color>, lasting <color=#D91414>3</color>s, max <color=#D91414>12 stacks</color>. Duration resets every time it is triggered. All stacks will be lost when <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color> ends. On maximum stacks, additionally increases Base DMG by <color=#D91414>25%</color>.
- When <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> ends, <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color> will also end.
- In <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color>, shots generate <color=#D91414>2/6/10/14/18/37</color> extra Signature Energy based on the current shot count. The count resets when <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color> ends.

Commands the drone to launch the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color>, consuming it in the process. While casting, freezes <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color>, pulls enemies and deals Ice DMG. After catching it, swaps the revolver, refills the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and renews the duration of <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>.\n- Launching the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG. Tap Red Orb or Dodge again to make Lucid Dreamer dash to the landing point of the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color> and become Invincible in the process. Catching it will refill the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and renew the duration of <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>.

Consumes the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color> to refill the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and consumes a <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color>. While casting, becomes Invincible, and the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> is frozen, while dealing Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. When <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color> is active, tap Red Orb again to command the drone to launch the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color>, freezing the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color>, pulling enemies and dealing Ice DMG. After catching it, swaps the revolver to refill the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and renew the duration of <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>.\n- <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG. In <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead and gains <color=#D91414>400</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>. While casting, gains <color=#D91414>13</color> Signature Energy for every <color=#D91414>2</color> Condensation Projectiles used.\n- While casting <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color>, tap Red Orb again to swap the Revolver, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG, then tap Red Orb or Dodge to make Lucid Dreamer dash to the landing point of the <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color> and become Invincible in the process. Catching it will refill the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and renew the duration of <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>.
Projects a drone to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG. After casting, gains <color=#D91414>3</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.

Title: Blink Assault: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>
Fluttering Interception: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow Orb + Yellow Orb</color>
Feather Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow Orb + Red Orb</color>
BriefDes: Draws the weapon and rushes forward to deal Ice DMG, while gaining <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains Signature Energy.
Steps back then bumps forward to deal Ice DMG, while gaining <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains Signature Energy.
Depending on the release timing, launches point-blank shots or covering fire to deal Ice DMG.
SpecificDes: Draws the weapon and rushes forward to deal Ice DMG, while gaining <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. Upon 3-Ping, additionally gains Signature Energy.\n- Based on the number of orbs pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG and gains <color=#D91414>20/40/80</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>10/20/30</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> can only be filled up to <color=#D91414>80%</color> in this way.\n- Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains <color=#D91414>8</color> Signature Energy.

Steps back then bumps forward to deal Ice DMG, while gaining <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains Signature Energy.\n- Based on the number of orbs pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG and gains <color=#D91414>20/40/80</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>10/20/30</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> can only be filled up to <color=#D91414>80%</color> in this way.\n- Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains <color=#D91414>8</color> Signature Energy.

Depending on the release timing, launches point-blank shots or covering fire to deal Ice DMG.
- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs pinged, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG.
- If Lucid Dreamer is hit during point-blank shots, launches covering fire instead to deal <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ice DMG and gain <color=#D91414>40</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color>. If the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> is full when covering fire is triggered, enters <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>.
- Casting this in <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> will count as casting <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color>.

Title: Icicle Burst: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>
Aerial Suppression: <color=#0d70bc>Blue Orb + Blue Orb</color>
Reticle Detonation: <color=#0d70bc>Blue Orb + Red Orb</color>
BriefDes: Steps back and throws a tactical grenade that explodes after a delay to deal Ice DMG to enemies, while gaining <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. If Lucid Dreamer is within the explosion range, this will count as self damage. Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains Signature Energy.

Summons a drone to instantly detonate the grenade, dealing Ice DMG to enemies and gaining <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color>. If Lucid Dreamer is within the explosion range, this will count as self damage. Upon a 3-Ping, additionally gains Signature Energy.
Attacks the tactical grenade to instantly detonate it, dealing Ice DMG to enemies. If Lucid Dreamer is within the explosion range, this will count as self damage.

Title: Sharp Gunslinger: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Frosty Barrage: <color=#0d70bc>Calibration Mode + Cylinder Not Empty + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Launches consecutive attacks with the revolver and summons a drone to aid.

Enables <color=#D91414>Double Action Mode</color> to activate a hidden <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and continuously shoot <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color>, while gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction. Depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, deals Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG and gains additional Signature Energy.
SpecificDes: Launches consecutive attacks with the revolver and summons a drone to aid.\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.

Enables <color=#D91414>Double Action Mode</color> to activate a hidden <color=#D91414>cylinder</color> and continuously shoot <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color>, while gaining Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction. Depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, deals Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG and gains additional Signature Energy.
- In <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>, each shot consumes <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color> to deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.
- In <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, each shot consumes <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color> to deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>.
- Based on the current shot count, each shot generates <color=#D91414>5/9/13/17/21/40</color> extra Signature Energy. The count resets when <color=#D91414>Double Action Mode</color> ends.
- When <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color> run out or <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> ends, <color=#D91414>Double Action Mode</color> will also end after a short delay.
- If a <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color> is available, pressing Basic Attack will automatically cast <color=#D91414>Snow Storm</color> and switch weapons, allowing continued firing.

Title: Superlink Flight: <color=#0d70bc>160 Signature Energy + Frosty Barrage/Snow Storm Inactive + Tap Signature</color>
Destructive Wave: <color=#0d70bc>160 Signature Energy + Frosty Barrage/Snow Storm Active + Tap Signature</color>
Inscription of Icefield
BriefDes: Summons a drone to create a field that gathers enemy units, then shoots Enhanced Condensation Projectiles to deal Ice or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. After casting, instantly gains an orb and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets. While casting, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, renews its duration.

Boosted by the drone, Lucid Dreamer leaps into the air, gathers enemies and rains down fire, dealing Ice or Glaciation DMG depending on his current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. After casting, instantly gains an orb and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets. While casting, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, renews its duration.

After casting <color=#D91414>Superlink Flight</color> or <color=#D91414>Destructive Wave</color>, leaves a <color=#D91414>Frozen Zone</color> on the battlefield that deals Ice DMG and weakens enemies.
SpecificDes:
Summons a drone to create a field that pulls enemy units, then shoots Enhanced Condensation Projectiles to deal Ice or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. After casting, instantly gains <color=#D91414>1</color> orb and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets. While casting, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, renews its duration.
- When in <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color> or not in any <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG. When in <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>, depletes the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> and ends <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color> after casting.
- When in <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead, then depletes the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> and ends <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color> after casting.
- In <color=#D91414>Repeater Mode</color>, casting <color=#D91414>Superlink Flight</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Maim</color>.
- After casting, forms <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> based on the current <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>.

Boosted by the drone, Lucid Dreamer leaps into the air, pulls enemies and rains down fire, dealing Ice or Glaciation DMG depending on the current <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>. After casting, instantly gains <color=#D91414>1</color> orb and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets. While casting, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, renews its duration.
- In <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>, instantly deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG, then depletes the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> and ends <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>. After leaving the battlefield, Lucid Dreamer deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> extra Ice DMG when casting <color=#D91414>Point Blank</color>. This effect only triggers once per switch-out.
- In <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead, then depletes the <color=#D91414>Calibration Gauge</color> and ends <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>. After leaving the battlefield, Lucid Dreamer deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> extra Glaciation DMG when casting <color=#D91414>Point Blank</color>. This effect only triggers once per switch-out.
- Casting this will consume all <color=#D91414>Correction Projectiles</color>. For every <color=#D91414>1</color> projectile consumed, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Destructive Wave</color> increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. If <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Correction Projectiles</color> are consumed in a single cast, the Base DMG will be increased by another <color=#D91414>100%</color>, and gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb.
- After casting, form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> based on the current <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>.

After casting <color=#D91414>Superlink Flight</color> or <color=#D91414>Destructive Wave</color>, leaves a <color=#D91414>Frozen Zone</color> on the battlefield that deals Ice DMG and weakens enemies.\n- The <color=#D91414>Frozen Zone</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG every second to enemies in the zone and lasts <color=#D91414>12</color>s.

Title: Point Blank: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>
BriefDes: Dashes forward, then shoots at point-blank range to deal Ice DMG and weaken the enemy.
SpecificDes: Dashes forward, then shoots at point-blank range to deal Ice DMG and weaken the enemy.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG and inflicts <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> that reduces Ice Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Title: Silent Snow: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Red Orb or Dodge</color>
Transient Blizzard: <color=#0d70bc>Calibration Gauge Full + Release Red Orb or Dodge</color>
LN2 Freeze
Efficiency Correction
Cavity Tear
Effect: Glaciation
BriefDes: Starts charging to generate <color=#D91414>Calibration</color>, while gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction.

Depending on the charging method, enters one of the <color=#D91414>Calibration Modes</color> to pull, weaken and damage enemies, while gaining Signature Energy and a <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color>. Triggers all available Matrix on cast. In <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, casting <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> or <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color> grants Shield.
When switched in, automatically refills the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color>.
Whenever consuming a <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color>, gains a <color=#D91414>Correction Projectile</color> and charges CUB.
Dealing damage with <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color> will also weaken the enemy.

Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
SpecificDes:
Starts charging to generate <color=#D91414>Calibration</color>, while gaining Super Armor and <color=#D91414>90%</color> DMG Reduction.
- When <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> is lower than <color=#D91414>80</color>, gains <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> every second. When <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> is lower than <color=#D91414>160</color> but no lower than <color=#D91414>80</color>, gains <color=#D91414>40</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> every second. When <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> is no lower than <color=#D91414>160</color>, gains <color=#D91414>80</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> every second.
- Max <color=#D91414>200</color> Calibration.
- Releasing the button early while charging will automatically dodge. Gains <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> normally while dodging. Upon a successful dodge, additionally gains a Signal Orb.

Depending on the charging method, enters one of the <color=#D91414>Calibration Modes</color> to pull, weaken and damage enemies, while gaining <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy and a <color=#D91414>Backup Revolver</color>. While casting, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. In <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, casting <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> or <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color> grants Shield.
- Press and hold Red Orb then release to enter <color=#D91414>Quiet Calibration Mode</color> and deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.
- Press and hold Dodge then release to enter <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color> and deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG.
- Upon entering <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, inflicts <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> that reduces Ice Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.
- <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> drains <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> every second. Once <color=#D91414>Calibration</color> is depleted, <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> will end. In <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, 3-Pings generate <color=#D91414>40</color> <color=#D91414>Calibration</color>.
- In <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, casting <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> or <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color> will grant a shield equal to <color=#D91414>5%</color> of max HP, stacking up to <color=#D91414>6</color> times.
- If the cylinder is empty upon entering <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color>, instantly gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Condensation Projectile.
When switched in, automatically refills the <color=#D91414>cylinder</color>.

Whenever consuming a <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color>, gains a <color=#D91414>Correction Projectile</color> and charges CUB. 
- While charging the CUB, consuming <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color> will also count as pinging <color=#D91414>1</color> basic Signal Orb.
- Consumes <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectile</color> to gain <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Correction Projectile</color>.
- Max <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Correction Projectiles</color>.

Dealing damage with <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color> will also weaken the enemy.\n- Dealing damage with <color=#D91414>Condensation Projectiles</color> will also inflict <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> that reduces Ice Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.

Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.

BriefDes: Increases Ice DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.
SpecificDes: Increases Ice DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.

BriefDes: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction.
SpecificDes: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s.

Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color>
BriefDes: Entering or refreshing <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> or casting <color=#D91414>Superlink Flight</color> or <color=#D91414>Destructive Wave</color> will activate all available QTEs.

Entrance Skill also counts as a Blue Orb 3-Ping. When switched in, gains a Signal Orb. Entering <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> grants Signature Energy. In <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, increases the amount of <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color> generated by <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> and <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color>. Increases Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> and <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color>.
SpecificDes: Entering or refreshing <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> or casting <color=#D91414>Superlink Flight</color> or <color=#D91414>Destructive Wave</color> will activate all available QTEs.

Entrance Skill also counts as a Blue Orb 3-Ping. When switched in, gains a Signal Orb. Entering <color=#D91414>Calibration Mode</color> grants <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. In <color=#D91414>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>, doubles the amount of <color=#D91414>Glaciation</color> generated by <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> and <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color>. Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Flurry Blitz</color> and <color=#D91414>Frosty Barrage</color> increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.

Title: Spiral Flame: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Red Orb</color>
Burning Wind: <color=#0d70bc>Airborne + Tap Red Orb</color>
Blazing Spark: <color=#0d70bc>After Red Orb 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Uses the dual blades to fly up, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG.
Turns around in midair and immediately slashes down, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG.

After each 3-Ping Red Orb Skill, tap Basic Attack to follow up with <color=#D91414>Flare Combo - Blazing Spark</color> once and make Lucia launch a joint attack with her phantom at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG. Lucia gains Super Armor during casting. After casting, she will gain Signature Energy and Aura Value based on the number of Red Orbs pinged (max 9 orbs).
SpecificDes:
Uses the dual blades to fly up, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG.
- Gains <color=#D91414>20/40/60 Quench Value</color> over time while casting based on the orbs pinged.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the orbs pinged.
- Casting the skill requires at least 1 White Orb. Lucia will temporarily stay airborne after casting.

Turns around in midair and immediately slashes down, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG.
- Gains <color=#D91414>20/40/60 Quench Value</color> over time based on the orbs pinged and gains Super Armor while casting.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the orbs pinged.
- Casting the skill requires at least 1 White Orb. Lucia will temporarily stay airborne after casting.
- Lucia can dodge attacks while turning around.

After each 3-Ping Red Orb Skill, tap Basic Attack to follow up with <color=#D91414>Flare Combo - Blazing Spark</color> once and make Lucia launch a joint attack with her phantom at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG. Lucia gains Super Armor during casting. After casting, she will gain Signature Energy and Aura Value based on the number of Red Orbs pinged (max 9 orbs).
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Gains <color=#D91414>1/2/5/6/7/10/11/12/15 Signature Energy</color> upon landing based on the orbs pinged.
- Immediately gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30/40/50/60/70/80/90 Aura Value</color> based on the orbs pinged.
- Lands after casting.

Title: Wing Blade: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Yellow Orb</color>
Plume Slash: <color=#0d70bc>Airborne + Tap Yellow Orb</color>
Duo Flash: <color=#0d70bc>After Yellow Orb 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack Repetitively</color>
BriefDes: Quickly thrusts the target, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG.
Turns around and dives to slash the target, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting.

After each 3-Ping Yellow Orb Skill, tap Basic Attack repetitively to follow up with <color=#D91414>Flare Combo - Duo Flash</color> up to 4 times, gain Aura Value, and deal Fire DMG. Lucia will gain Super Armor while casting.
SpecificDes:
Quickly thrusts the target, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG.
- Gains <color=#D91414>20/40/60 Quench Value</color> over time while casting based on the orbs pinged.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Casting the skill requires at least 1 White Orb.

Turns around and dives to slash the target, gaining <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> and dealing Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting.
- Gains <color=#D91414>20/40/60 Quench Value</color> over time while casting based on the orbs pinged.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Casting this skill requires at least 1 White Orb. Lands after casting.
- Gains <color=#D91414>30 Aura Value</color> over time while casting.
- Tap Basic Attack with precise timing after casting to cast <color=#D91414>Blazing Slash: Break</color>.

After each 3-Ping Yellow Orb Skill, tap Basic Attack repetitively to follow up with <color=#D91414>Flare Combo - Duo Flash</color> up to 4 times, gain Aura Value, and deal Fire DMG. Lucia will gain Super Armor while casting.
- For the first 3 <color=#D91414>Flare Combo - Duo Flash</color>, gains <color=#D91414>20 Aura Value</color> over time while casting.
- For the 4th <color=#D91414>Flare Combo - Duo Flash</color>, gains <color=#D91414>30 Aura Value</color> and <color=#D91414>5 Signature Energy</color> over time while casting. After casting, tap Basic Attack with precise timing to cast <color=#D91414>Blazing Slash: Break</color>.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.

Title: Solar Thrust: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Blue Orb</color>
Falling Light: <color=#0d70bc>Airborne + Tap Blue Orb</color>
Thunder Charge: <color=#0d70bc>After Basic Attack Phase 5 + Tap Blue Orb</color>
Walking Thunder: <color=#0d70bc>Max Electric Charge + Press and Hold Blue Orb</color>
Thunderbolt: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Plasma Orb</color>
BriefDes: Thrusts while leaping up, dealing Fire DMG.
Quickly slashes from midair, dealing Fire DMG.

Tap Blue Orb after Basic Attack phase 5 to make Lucia turn around and slash hard, dealing Fire DMG and gaining Electric Charge. Lucia will gain Super Armor while casting. Can follow up with Basic Attack phase 3 after casting.

When the team reaches the Max Electric Charge, press and hold Blue Orb to activate the Electric Storm Flash status. Can also press and hold Blue Orb while <color=#D91414>Signature: Melting Quench</color> is being cast.

During the Electric Storm Flash status, all Signal Orbs will be turned into <color=#D91414>Plasma Orbs</color>. After a <color=#D91414>Plasma Orb</color> ping, leaps and slashes the target from midair, gaining Aura Value and dealing Plasma Beam DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting. Upon exiting the Electric Storm Flash status, turns all <color=#D91414>Plasma Orbs</color> into White Orbs.
SpecificDes:
Thrusts while leaping up, dealing Fire DMG.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Temporarily stays airborne after casting.
- Casting does not consume White Orbs.

Quickly slashes from midair, dealing Fire DMG.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Lands after casting.
- Casting does not consume White Orbs.

Tap Blue Orb after Basic Attack phase 5 to make Lucia turn around and slash hard, dealing Fire DMG and gaining Electric Charge. Lucia will gain Super Armor while casting. Can follow up with Basic Attack phase 3 after casting.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG.\n- Gains <color=#D91414>250 Electric Charge</color> over time while casting.

When the team reaches the Max Electric Charge, press and hold Blue Orb to activate the Electric Storm Flash status. Can also press and hold Blue Orb while <color=#D91414>Signature: Melting Quench</color> is being cast.

During the Electric Storm Flash status, all Signal Orbs will be turned into <color=#D91414>Plasma Orbs</color>. After a <color=#D91414>Plasma Orb</color> ping, leaps and slashes the target from midair, gaining Aura Value and dealing Plasma Beam DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting. Upon exiting the Electric Storm Flash status, turns all <color=#D91414>Plasma Orbs</color> into White Orbs.\n- Gains <color=#D91414>20/40/60 Aura Value</color> based on the orbs pinged.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG based on the orbs pinged.

Title: Blazing Slash: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>
Aura Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Fire Thunder Form + Max Aura Value + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Aura Feather: <color=#0d70bc>Fire Thunder Form + After Aura Blast + Tap Basic Attack</color>
Aura Dance: <color=#0d70bc>Airborne + 30 Aura Value + Press and Hold/Tap Basic Attack</color>
BriefDes: Wields the dual blades to slash the target repetitively, dealing Fire DMG. While <color=#D91414>airborne</color>, Basic Attacks will deal Fire DMG and grant Aura Value. Tapping Basic Attack with specific timing will trigger a special attack.
Dashes continuously and slashes the space open, dealing Fire DMG at the cost of all Aura Value. After casting, gains the <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color> and Signature Energy.
Turns around and slashes the space open, dealing Fire DMG.

While <color=#D91414>airborne</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to make Lucia enter the Standby Stance. Hold/tap Basic Attack repetitively to make her cast <color=#D91414>Aura Dance</color>, pulling in nearby enemies from midair, slashing enemies repetitively, spending Aura Value, gaining Signature Energy, and dealing Fire DMG.
SpecificDes:
Wields the dual blades to slash the target repetitively, dealing Fire DMG. While <color=#D91414>airborne</color>, Basic Attacks will deal Fire DMG and grant Aura Value. Tapping Basic Attack with specific timing will trigger a special attack.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.
- While <color=#D91414>airborne</color>, gains Super Armor during Basic Attack and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG in total. Each Basic Attack grants <color=#D91414>25 Aura Value</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Blazing Slash: Break</color>: Tap Basic Attack with precise timing after Basic Attack phase 5, or tap Basic Attack after a successful dodge to cast <color=#D91414>Blazing Slash: Break</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>30 Aura Value</color>. Lucia will gain Super Armor while casting. Can follow up with Basic Attack phase 4 after casting.

Dashes continuously and slashes the space open, dealing Fire DMG at the cost of all Aura Value. After casting, gains the <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color> and Signature Energy.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Gains <color=#D91414>32 Signature Energy</color> over time while casting.
- Deals no Fire DMG but <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG in the Electric Storm Flash status.
- Becomes Invincible while casting.
- The <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color> will disappear when Lucia exits <color=#D91414>Fire Thunder Form</color> or <color=#D91414>lands</color>.

Turns around and slashes the space open, dealing Fire DMG.
- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.
- Deals no Fire DMG but <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG in the Electric Storm Flash status.
- Becomes Invincible while casting.

While <color=#D91414>airborne</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to make Lucia enter the Standby Stance. Hold/tap Basic Attack repetitively to make her cast <color=#D91414>Aura Dance</color>, pulling in nearby enemies from midair, slashing enemies repetitively, spending Aura Value, gaining Signature Energy, and dealing Fire DMG.
- Spends <color=#D91414>30 Aura Value</color>, gains <color=#D91414>11 Signature Energy</color>, and deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG every time when casting <color=#D91414>Aura Dance</color>.
- Deals no Fire DMG but <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG in the Electric Storm Flash status.
- Becomes Invincible while casting.

Title: Leap: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Signature</color>
Melting Quench: <color=#0d70bc>Max Quench Value + Press and Hold Signature</color>
Crowd Slash: <color=#0d70bc>Fire Thunder Form + 90 Signature Energy + Press and Hold Signature</color>
Soaring Fire: <color=#0d70bc>Fire Thunder Form + 90 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>
Eclipse Daybreak: <color=#0d70bc>Fire Thunder Form + 90 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>
BriefDes: Leaps and temporarily stays airborne.

Raises the blade to absorb the solar power, entering the <color=#D91414>Fire Thunder Form</color> and dealing Fire DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. If casting with the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect, refreshes its duration. Temporarily stays airborne after casting.

Leaps and slashes enemies in a large area, dealing Fire DMG. When having the <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color>, spends the <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color> to amplify the damage. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. When having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect while casting, refreshes its duration. After casting, enters the <color=#D91414>Fire Thunder Form</color> again and resets <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> to the maximum.
Leaps and becomes <color=#D91414>airborne</color>.

Leaps to gather energy, dives at the enemy target, dealing Fire DMG. When having the <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color>, spends the <color=#D91414>Aura Mark</color> to amplify the damage. Meanwhile, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. When casting with the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect, refreshes its duration. Lands after casting.
SpecificDes: Leaps and temporarily stays airborne.\n- Lucia can dodge attacks while leaping.

Raises the blade to absorb the solar power, entering the <color=#D91414>Fire Thunder Form</color> and dealing Fire DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. If casting with the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect, refreshes its duration. Temporarily stays airborne after casting.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\n- The <color=#D91414>Fire Thunder Form</color> lasts <color=#D91414>12s</color>, during which time <color=#D91414>Quench Value</color> will be consumed over time. BriefDes: Basic Attack only grants Red or Yellow Orbs. Ping Red or Yellow Orbs to gain <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>.

Yata can enhance herself through <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>.
- Yata is in the <color=#D91414>Void</color> Realm upon entering the battlefield. After gaining <color=#D91414>90</color> <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>, she will enter the <color=#D91414>Sanctuary</color> Realm and gains an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color>, granting her Super Armor when casting <color=#D91414>Thunder Outflux - Night Raid</color>.
- After gaining <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color> in the <color=#D91414>Sanctuary</color> Realm, Yata will enter the <color=#D91414>Epiphany</color> Realm and gain an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color> and an ATK Bonus. After that, every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color> will grant an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color>.
- Gaining an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color> will enhance the existing <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orbs</color>.
- Upon exiting the battlefield, Yata will reenter the <color=#D91414>Void</color> Realm and clear her <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>, <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orbs</color>.

Tap Dodge without moving the joystick to perform a Block. After a successful Block, tap Basic Attack to counterattack, dealing Lightning DMG. If the Block triggers a Matrix, <color=#D91414>Mirror Return</color> will additionally restore a set of Signal Orbs.

Yata can cast <color=#D91414>Esotericism: Slash</color> to gain <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> up to <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. Press and hold Basic Attack with <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> to spend all <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> stacks to cast <color=#D91414>Night Raid</color>, dealing damage based on the <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> stacks spent.

Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
SpecificDes: Basic Attack only grants Red or Yellow Orbs. Ping Red or Yellow Orbs to gain <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>.

Yata can enhance herself through <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>.
- Yata is in the <color=#D91414>Void Realm</color> upon entering the battlefield. After gaining <color=#D91414>90</color> <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>, she will enter the <color=#D91414>Sanctuary Realm</color> and gains an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color>, granting her Super Armor when casting <color=#D91414>Thunder Outflux - Night Raid</color>.
- After gaining <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color> in the <color=#D91414>Sanctuary Realm</color>, Yata will enter the <color=#D91414>Epiphany Realm</color> and gain an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color> and a <color=#D91414>10%</color> ATK Bonus. After that, every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color> will grant an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color>.
- Gaining an <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orb</color> will enhance the existing <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orbs</color>.
- Upon exiting the battlefield, Yata will reenter the <color=#D91414>Void Realm</color> and clear her <color=#D91414>Heartflow</color>, <color=#D91414>Illumination</color>, and <color=#D91414>Esoteric Orbs</color>.

Tap Dodge without moving the joystick to perform a Block. After a successful Block, tap Basic Attack to counterattack, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color></color> Lightning DMG. If the Block triggers a Matrix, <color=#D91414>Mirror Return</color> will additionally restore a set of Signal Orbs.

Yata gains <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> by casting <color=#D91414>Esotericism: Slash</color>. Illumination can stack up to 2 times. With <color=#D91414>Illumination</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to spend all <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> stacks and cast <color=#D91414>Night Raid</color>, dealing damage based on <color=#D91414>Illumination</color> stacks spent.
- <color=#D91414>Night Raid - Patrol</color> deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color></color> Lightning DMG, then followed by <color=#D91414>Night Raid - Snatch</color> that can be channeled. When there are Ice Spikes, deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color></color> Glaciation DMG instead.
- <color=#D91414>Night Raid - Snatch</color> deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color></color> Lightning DMG every second. When casting it, Yata will automatically block incoming attacks at the cost of Dodge Gauge value and gain 1 Signal Orb every <color=#D91414>1.5s</color>. Release Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Night Raid - Halt</color> in advance. When there are Ice Spikes, deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color></color> Glaciation DMG every second.
- Channeling <color=#D91414>Night Raid - Snatch</color> for more than 1s to accumulate Glaciation Gauge value over time and at an increasing speed. After 1s, gains <color=#D91414>100</color> Glaciation Value every second. After 2s, gains <color=#D91414>200</color> Glaciation Value every second. After 4s, gains <color=#D91414>250</color> Glaciation Value every second.
- <color=#D91414>Night Raid - Halt</color> deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{8}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{9}%</color></color> Lightning DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy after casting it. When there are Ice Spikes, deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{10}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{11}%</color></color> Glaciation DMG instead.

Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>.

SpecificDes:
Startrail performs a spinning slash attack and enters the <color=#D91414>Red Orb Combo</color>, dealing Lightning DMG and applying a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> on hit. The <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> explodes after <color=#D91414>0.7</color>s, dealing Lightning DMG. If a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> already exists when this skill is cast, it will detonate immediately, creating a shockwave that deals damage to the user.
- The slash attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG. The <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> explosion deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.
- If hit while casting this skill, blocks with a shield and gains <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Crystal Field</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks.
- If the target has a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> when this skill is cast, the <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> will detonate immediately and block the shockwave, gaining an extra <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Crystal Field</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks.

Leaps and performs a downward slash, dealing Lightning DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color></color> Lightning DMG and gains <color=#D91414>15/30/50</color> <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>100</color> points.

SpecificDes: Spins to attack enemies, combining the weapon into a <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color>. Sprints and attacks enemies, splitting the <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color> into a <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing Lightning DMG while gaining Super Armor.\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.

Immediately combines the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color> into a <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color> and continuously attacks enemies while consuming <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>. Pulls enemies together and deals Ignition DMG, applying <color=#D91414>Combustible Charge</color>, gaining a <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> and Signature Energy. While this skill is cast, gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction, and cannot cast <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>.
- Continuously consumes up to <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> each time, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ignition DMG in total, applying <color=#D91414>5000</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charge</color>, and gaining <color=#D91414>60</color> Signature Energy. While this skill is cast, gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.
- Releasing Yellow Orb prematurely will immediately trigger <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color>.
- <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> lasts <color=#D91414>10</color> seconds. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Title: Blue Orb Combo 1: <color=#0d70bc>Not in Blue Orb Combo + Tap Blue Orb</color>
Blue Orb Combo 2: <color=#0d70bc>In Blue Orb Combo + Ping Blue Signal Orb</color>
BriefDes: Startrail performs a sprint attack and enters the <color=#D91414>Blue Orb Combo</color>, dealing Lightning DMG and applying a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> on hit. If a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> already exists when this skill is cast, it will detonate immediately, creating a shockwave that deals damage to the user.
Turns around and performs a slash, dealing Lightning DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>.
SpecificDes:
Startrail performs a sprint attack and enters the <color=#D91414>Blue Orb Combo</color>, dealing Lightning DMG and applying a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> on hit. The <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> explodes after <color=#D91414>0.7</color>s, dealing Lightning DMG. If a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> already exists when this skill is cast, it will detonate immediately, creating a shockwave that deals damage to the user.
- The sprint attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG. The <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> explosion deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.
- If hit while using this skill, block with a shield and gain <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Crystal Field</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks.
- If the target has a <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> when this skill is cast, the <color=#D91414>Thunderflare Mark</color> will detonate immediately and block the shockwave, gaining an extra <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Crystal Field</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks.

Turns around and performs a slash, dealing Lightning DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>.\n- Deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color></color> Lightning DMG and gains <color=#D91414>15/30/50</color> <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>100</color> points.

Title: Meteoric Doom: <color=#0d70bc>Shield Axe in Hand + At Least 100 points of Overload or Starlight + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>
Blazing Rift: <color=#0d70bc>During Inferno Cyclone + Release Yellow Orb or Starlight Points are depleted During Inferno Cyclone</color>

Hyper Mecha
Effect: Ignition
BriefDes: Consumes all <color=#D91414>Overload</color> and <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color>, pulling nearby enemies and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> while casting and it is not allowed to cast <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>. Deals Lightning DMG and grants Signature Energy.

Immediately switches the weapon to the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing Ignition DMG and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while this skill is cast. Upon first casting, gains an enhanced effect.
When Startrail deals damage using the Shield Axe, enemies will be weakened.
When Startrail switches to the Shield Axe, gains a Shield. The Shield is removed when switching back to the Sword Shield. Upon entering battle each time, gains a Signal Orb.

Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.
SpecificDes:
Consumes all <color=#D91414>Overload</color> and <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color>, pulling nearby enemies and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> while casting and it is not allowed to cast <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>. Deals Lightning DMG and grants Signature Energy.
- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG and gains <color=#D91414>30</color> Signature Energy.
- Consumes all <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> when this skill is cast, converting them into an equal amount of <color=#D91414>Overload</color>.
- For every <color=#D91414>15</color> points of <color=#D91414>Overload</color> consumed, the Base DMG of this <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color> increases by <color=#D91414>3%</color>.

Immediately switches the weapon to the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing Ignition DMG and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while this skill is cast. Upon first casting, gains an enhanced effect.\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ignition DMG. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction while this skill is cast.\n- Upon first casting, <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> is enhanced, granting <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. Additionally, for each <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> consumed by <color=#D91414>Inferno Cyclone</color>, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. After casting <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>, the next <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> will be granted an enhanced effect again.

When Startrail deals damage using the <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color>, enemies will be weakened.\n- Applies a <color=#D91414>Turbulence Interference</color> effect to enemies, reducing their Lightning Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>2</color>s.\n- If a <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> is active when dealing damage, it will instead apply a <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect to enemies, reducing their Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>2</color>s.

When Startrail switches to the Shield Axe, gains a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of the maximum HP. The Shield is removed when switching back to the Sword Shield. Upon entering battle each time, gains a Signal Orb.

Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.

Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color> increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>, and Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> increases by <color=#D91414>60%</color>. <color=#D91414>Inferno Cyclone</color> applies <color=#D91414>Combustible Charge</color> <color=#D91414>100%</color> faster.

Resistance Reduction of <color=#D91414>Turbulence Interference</color> and <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Each time <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color> consumes <color=#D91414>75</color> points of <color=#D91414>Overload</color>, the next casting of <color=#D91414>Starshard Slash</color> increases its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>25%</color>. Stacks are cleared when separating the Shield Axe. For each <color=#D91414>5</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Combustible</color> on the target, casting <color=#D91414>Cosmic Starstrike: Burn</color> increases its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>16%</color>. Upon entering the battle, casting <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color> for the first time grants <color=#D91414>100</color> points of Starlight. The phase 4 of the first <color=#D91414>Flowing Light</color> cast grants a <color=#D91414>16</color> extra points of Signature Energy. Cooldown time for switching between all characters in the team reduces by <color=#D91414>3</color>s. This effect does not stack with other effects of the same type.
